ÂâçË®Ä Êú¨ÊñáÊòØ‰ª•ÂâçÂÅöÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∞è‰∏úË•øÁöÑÂ§ÑÁêÜÂâçÂ•èÔºåÂΩìÊó∂‰πüËÆ∞ÂΩïËøáÔºåÁé∞Âú®ÊääÂÆÉÁøªÂá∫Êù•ÈáçÊñ∞ÁúãÁúã„ÄÇÈÇ£‰∏™‰∏úË•øÈúÄË¶ÅÂà©Áî®Ê∑±Â∫¶ÂõæÔºåShaun ÂΩìÊó∂ËøòÊ≤°ÊãøÂà∞ KinectÔºåÂ∞±Âú®ÁΩë‰∏ä‰∏ã‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∫õÊï∞ÊçÆÔºàhttp://eeeweba.ntu.edu.sg/computervision/people/home/renzhou/HandGesture.htmÔºâÔºåËØ•Êï∞ÊçÆÈõÜÂåÖÂê´‰∫ÜÂΩ©Ëâ≤ÂõæÂèäÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶ÂõæÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØËØ•Êï∞ÊçÆÈõÜÊ≤°Êúâ‰ª•ÂõæÂÉèÂΩ¢ÂºèÂ≠òÂÇ®Ê∑±Â∫¶ÂÄºÔºåËÄåÊòØÁî® txt ÊñáÊú¨‰ª•Ë°åÂàóÂΩ¢ÂºèÂ≠òÂÇ®ÁúüÊ≠£ÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶ÂÄºÔºàÂçï‰Ωç‰∏∫ mmÔºâÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Âπ∂‰∏çËÉΩÁõ¥ËßÇÁöÑÁúãÂà∞Ê∑±Â∫¶ÂõæÂÉèÔºåShaun ÈúÄË¶ÅÊääËøô‰∫õÊ∑±Â∫¶ÂÄº‰ªé txt ÊñáÊú¨ÊèêÂèñÂá∫Êù•Âπ∂ÊääÂÆÉ‰ª•ÂõæÂÉèÁöÑÂΩ¢ÂºèÂëàÁé∞Âá∫Êù•ÔºåÁî±‰∫éÈúÄÊ±ÇÊØîËæÉÁâπÊÆäÔºåÁΩë‰∏äÊ≤°ÁúãÂà∞Áé∞ÊàêÁöÑËß£ÂÜ≥ÁöÑÊñπÊ°àÔºåÊâÄ‰ª• Shaun Âè™ÊúâÁî®Áé∞ÊàêÁöÑËΩÆÂ≠êËá™Â∑±ÂÅö‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∫Ü„ÄÇÊÄùË∑ØÁØá Á®ãÂ∫èÁöÑÂü∫Êú¨ÊÄùË∑ØÊòØÔºöÂÖàÊâæÂà∞ÁõÆÂΩïÂèäÂ≠êÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ txt Êñá‰ª∂Ë∑ØÂæÑÔºõÂÜçÊ†πÊçÆË∑ØÂæÑÂàÜÂà´ËØªÂèñ txt Êñá‰ª∂ÔºåÊåâË°åËØªÂèñ‰πãÂêéÂÜçËøõË°åÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÂàÜÂâ≤ÊèêÂèñÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶ÂÄºÔºõ‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰æø‰∫é‰ª•ÂõæÂÉèÂΩ¢ÂºèÊòæÁ§∫ÔºåÂ∞ÜÊ∑±Â∫¶ÂÄºÂΩí‰∏ÄÂåñËá≥ 0~255 Â≠òÂÖ• 8 ‰ΩçÂçïÈÄöÈÅìÁöÑ Mat Á±ªÂûãÊï∞ÊçÆ‰∏≠ÔºåÊúÄÂêé‰ª• png ÂõæÂÉèÂΩ¢Âºè‰øùÂ≠òËá≥ÂêÑ‰∏™ÁõÆÂΩï„ÄÇÂÆûÁé∞ÁØá Âõ†‰∏∫ÂΩìÊó∂ËøòÂú®Áî® opencv-2.4.11ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Êú¨ÊñáÊâÄÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÊòØÂü∫‰∫é opencv-2.4.11Ôºå‰∏çËøáÂ∫îËØ•Âè™Ë¶ÅÂú® opencv-2.0 ÁâàÊú¨Âèä‰ª•‰∏äÂè™Ë¶ÅÊúâ Mat Êï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑÁöÑÈÉΩËÉΩÁî®ÔºåÊØïÁ´ü Shaun Âè™Áî®Âà∞‰∫Ü OpenCV ‰∏≠ÁöÑ Mat Êï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑ„ÄÇTalk is cheap, show you the codeÔºà‰ª£Á†ÅÂæà‰π±Ôºå‰º∞ËÆ°‰πüÂè™Áî®Ëøô‰πà‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Â∞±Ê≤°ÊÄé‰πàÊ≥®ÊÑè‰∫Ü :-PÔºâ„ÄÇÂÖ∑‰Ωì C++ ÂÆûÁé∞‰ª£Á†Å‰∏∫Ôºö#include <opencv2/core/core.hpp> #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp> #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>#include <io.h> #include <direct.h> #include <fstream>#include <iostream>using namespace cv;using namespace std;// ******************************************************************// @refer to [C++Êñá‰ª∂ËØªÂÜôÊìç‰ΩúÔºà‰∫åÔºâÈÄêÂ≠óÁ¨¶ËØªÂèñÊñáÊú¨ÂíåÈÄêË°åËØªÂèñÊñáÊú¨](http://blog.csdn.net/wangshihui512/article/details/8921924)// [Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÂàÜÂâ≤(C++)](http://www.cnblogs.com/MikeZhang/archive/2012/03/24/MySplitFunCPP.html)// [C++ËØªÂèñÊñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏≠ÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂ÊàñËÄÖÊòØÁâπÂÆöÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂](http://blog.csdn.net/adong76/article/details/39432467)// [C/C++ Âà§Êñ≠Êñá‰ª∂Â§πÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú®‰ª•ÂèäÂàõÂª∫„ÄÅÂà†Èô§Êñá‰ª∂Â§π windows‰ª•ÂèälinuxÈÄöÁî®](http://blog.csdn.net/u012005313/article/details/50688257)// [Split a string in C++?](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/236129/split-a-string-in-c)// [KinectÂºÄÂèëÂ≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞‰πãÔºàÂÖ≠ÔºâÂ∏¶Ê∏∏ÊàèËÄÖIDÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶Êï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÊèêÂèñ](http://blog.csdn.net/zouxy09/article/details/8151044)// [Depth Map Tutorial](http://www.pages.drexel.edu/~nk752/depthMapTut.html)// ******************************************************************// ----- ÈÄê‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ËØªÂèñÊñá‰ª∂ --------void testByChar() { fstream testByCharFile; char c; testByCharFile.open("./test.txt",ios::in); while(!testByCharFile.eof()) { testByCharFile>>c; cout<<c; } testByCharFile.close(); } // -------- ÈÄêË°åËØªÂèñÊñá‰ª∂ -------------------void testByLine() { char buffer[256]; fstream outFile; outFile.open("./test.txt",ios::in); while(!outFile.eof()) { outFile.getline(buffer, 256, '
');//getline(char *,int,char) Ë°®Á§∫ËØ•Ë°åÂ≠óÁ¨¶ËææÂà∞256‰∏™ÊàñÈÅáÂà∞Êç¢Ë°åÂ∞±ÁªìÊùü cout<<buffer<<endl; } outFile.close(); } // ------- ÂàÜÂâ≤Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ --------------void splitString() { char buffer[1280]; fstream outFile; outFile.open("./test.txt",ios::in); while(!outFile.eof()) { outFile.getline(buffer, 1280, '
');//getline(char *,int,char) Ë°®Á§∫ËØ•Ë°åÂ≠óÁ¨¶ËææÂà∞1280‰∏™ÊàñÈÅáÂà∞Êç¢Ë°åÂ∞±ÁªìÊùü cout<<buffer<<endl; const char *d = " ,*"; char *p; p = strtok(buffer, d); while(p) { printf("%s
", p); p=strtok(NULL, d); } } outFile.close(); } // Ëé∑ÂèñÊñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏ãÊåáÂÆöÊ†ºÂºèÊâÄÊúâÊñá‰ª∂Âêçvoid getAllFormatFiles( string path, string format, vector<string>& files ) { //Êñá‰ª∂Âè•ÊüÑ long hFile = 0; //Êñá‰ª∂‰ø°ÊÅØ struct _finddata_t fileinfo; string pathName; if((hFile = _findfirst(pathName.assign(path).append("/*." + format).c_str(),&fileinfo)) != -1) { do { //Â¶ÇÊûúÊòØÁõÆÂΩï,Ëø≠‰ª£‰πã //Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏çÊòØ,Âä†ÂÖ•ÂàóË°® if((fileinfo.attrib & _A_SUBDIR)) { if(strcmp(fileinfo.name,".") != 0 && strcmp(fileinfo.name,"..") != 0) { //files.push_back(p.assign(path).append("/").append(fileinfo.name) ); getAllFormatFiles( pathName.assign(path).append("/").append(fileinfo.name), format, files); } } else { files.push_back(pathName.assign(path).append("/").append(fileinfo.name) ); } }while(_findnext(hFile, &fileinfo) == 0); _findclose(hFile); } } // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/236129/split-a-string-in-c// ---- stackoverflow‰∏äÂ§ßÁ•ûÁöÑC++ÁâàÊú¨ÂàÜÂâ≤Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ --------------------std::vector<std::string> split(const std::string& text, const std::string& delims){ std::vector<std::string> tokens; std::size_t start = text.find_first_not_of(delims), end = 0; while((end = text.find_first_of(delims, start)) != std::string::npos) { tokens.push_back(text.substr(start, end - start)); start = text.find_first_not_of(delims, end); } if(start != std::string::npos) tokens.push_back(text.substr(start)); return tokens;}// ÂàõÂª∫Êñá‰ª∂Â§πÂèäÂ≠êÊñá‰ª∂Â§πvoid makeDir(const string &path){ std::vector<std::string> tokens; std::size_t start = 0, end = 0; while ((end = path.find('/', start)) != std::string::npos) { if (end != start) { tokens.push_back(path.substr(0, end)); } start = end + 1; } if (end != start) { tokens.push_back(path); } vector<string>::const_iterator itp = tokens.begin(); while (itp != tokens.end()) { if (access(itp->c_str(), 0) == -1) // Âà§Êñ≠Êñá‰ª∂Â§πÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú® { cout<<*itp<<" is not existing"<<endl; cout<<"now make it"<<endl; if (mkdir(itp->c_str()) == 0) // ‰∏çÂ≠òÂú®ÂàôÂàõÂª∫ÔºåÂè™ËÉΩ‰∏ÄÁ∫ß‰∏ÄÁ∫ßÁöÑÂàõÂª∫ { cout<<"make successfully"<<endl; } } cout << *itp++ <<endl; }}// TxtÊñá‰ª∂ËΩ¨opencv MatÔºàtxtÊñá‰ª∂‰∏≠Â≠òÁöÑÊòØ‰ª•Ë°åÂàóÂΩ¢ÂºèÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶ÂÄºÔºâcv::Mat Txt2DepthMat(const string &txtname){ cv::Mat result(480, 640, CV_8UC1, cv::Scalar(0)); char buffer[12800]; // ÊåâË°åËØªÂèñÊñá‰ª∂ fstream outFile; const char *d = ","; // ‰ª•,‰∏∫ÂàÜÂâ≤ÁÇπ char *p; // ÂàÜÂâ≤Âá∫ÁöÑÂ≠ê‰∏≤ outFile.open(txtname, ios::in); for (int i = 0; outFile.getline(buffer, 12800, '
') != NULL && i < result.rows; i++) { p = strtok(buffer, d); for (int j = 0; p && j < result.cols; j++) { int realDepth = (atoi(p) & 0xfff8) >> 3; //ÊèêÂèñË∑ùÁ¶ª‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÈ´ò13‰Ωç int depth = (int)(256 * realDepth / 0x0fff); //Âõ†‰∏∫ÊèêÂèñÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØÊòØË∑ùÁ¶ª‰ø°ÊÅØÔºå‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰æø‰∫éÊòæÁ§∫ÔºåËøôÈáåÂΩí‰∏ÄÂåñ‰∏∫0-255 result.at<uchar>(i, j) = cv::saturate_cast<uchar>(depth); p = strtok(NULL, d); } } outFile.close(); return result;}// ‰ª•È¢úËâ≤Ë°®Á§∫Ê∑±Â∫¶‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåË∂äÊöñÔºàÁ∫¢Ëâ≤ÔºâË∂äËøëÔºåË∂äÂÜ∑ÔºàËìùËâ≤ÔºâË∂äËøúcv::Mat Depth2Color(const cv::Mat &depth){ cv::Mat result(depth.size(), CV_8UC3, cv::Scalar::all(0)); int tempDepth, depthRed, depthGreen, depthBlue; for (int i = 0; i < result.rows; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < result.cols; j++) { tempDepth = 255 - depth.at<uchar>(i, j); if(tempDepth < 43) { depthRed = tempDepth * 6; depthGreen = 0; depthBlue = tempDepth * 6; } if(tempDepth > 42 && tempDepth < 85) { depthRed = 255 - (tempDepth - 43) * 6; depthGreen = 0; depthBlue = 255; } if(tempDepth > 84 && tempDepth < 128) { depthRed = 0; depthGreen = (tempDepth - 85) * 6; depthBlue = 255; } if(tempDepth > 127 && tempDepth < 169) { depthRed = 0; depthGreen = 255; depthBlue = 255 - (tempDepth - 128) * 6; } if(tempDepth > 168 && tempDepth < 212) { depthRed = (tempDepth - 169) * 6; depthGreen = 255; depthBlue = 0; } if(tempDepth > 211 && tempDepth < 254) { depthRed = 255; depthGreen = 255 - (tempDepth - 212) * 6; depthBlue = 0; } if(tempDepth > 253) { depthRed = 255; depthGreen = 0; depthBlue = 0; } if (tempDepth == 255) { depthRed = 0; depthGreen = 0; depthBlue = 0; } result.at<Vec3b>(i, j)[0] = depthBlue; result.at<Vec3b>(i, j)[1] = depthGreen; result.at<Vec3b>(i, j)[2] = depthRed; } } return result;}int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ string filePath = "C:/Users/XXXXXX/Downloads/NTU-Microsoft-Kinect-HandGesture Dataset/Depth"; vector<string> files; //ËØªÂèñÊâÄÊúâÊñá‰ª∂ string format = "*"; // ‰∏çÁü•ÈÅì‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÂú®ÊàëÁîµËÑëËØª‰∏ç‰∫ÜÁâπÂÆöÊñá‰ª∂Ôºü getAllFormatFiles(filePath, format, files); for (int i = 0; i < files.size(); i++) { cv::Mat tempMat = Txt2DepthMat(files[i]); files[i].replace(0, 66, "../data"); files[i].replace(files[i].find(".txt"), files[i].length() - 1, ".png"); cout<< files[i] << endl; string tempString = files[i].substr(0, files[i].find_last_of("/")); makeDir(tempString); cv::imwrite(files[i], tempMat); } cout << "File Size: " << files.size() << endl; //cv::imshow("test", Depth2Color(Txt2DepthMat("./1.txt"))); cv::waitKey(0); return 0;}2018-01-01 BTWÔºö‰ª•‰∏ä‰ª£Á†ÅÂú® VS2010+Win7 ‰∏ãÁºñËØëËøêË°åÈÄöËøáÔºåÂú® VS2013+Win10 ‰∏ã for (int i = 0; outFile.getline(buffer, 12800, '
') != NULL && i < result.rows; i++) ‰ºöÊä•ÈîôÔºåÂèØËÉΩÈúÄË¶ÅÊîπÊàê for (int i = 0; outFile.getline(buffer, 12800, '
') && i < result.rows; i++) ÔºåÂç≥ÂéªÊéâÂêéÈù¢ÁöÑ != NULL„ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ Ê≠£Â¶ÇÂâçË®ÄÊâÄËØ¥ÔºåÊú¨ÊñáÊòØ‰ª•ÂâçËÆ∞ÂΩïËøáÁöÑÔºå‰∏Ä‰∫õÁªÜËäÇ‰πüÂø´ÂøòËÆ∞ÔºåËøôÊ¨°ÈáçÂÜôÁÆóÊòØÂõûÈ°æ‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂêßÔºåËøôÊÆµÁ®ãÂ∫èÂèØËÉΩ‰πüÁ°ÆÂÆûÂè™Áî®Ëøô‰πà‰∏ÄÊ¨°Ôºå‰ΩÜÂÖ∂‰∏≠Áî®Âà∞‰∫Ü‰∏çÂ∞ë C++ Â§ÑÁêÜÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÂíåËØªÂÜôÊñá‰ª∂Á≠âÁõ∏ÂÖ≥Áü•ËØÜÔºåËÄåËøô‰∫õÁü•ËØÜÔºåÂú®‰ª•ÂêéÊúâÊûÅÂ§ßÁöÑÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÂÜçÊ¨°Áî®Âà∞ÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§ËÆ∞ÂΩï ‚Üñ(^œâ^)‚Üó„ÄÇÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô[1] C++Êñá‰ª∂ËØªÂÜôÊìç‰ΩúÔºà‰∫åÔºâÈÄêÂ≠óÁ¨¶ËØªÂèñÊñáÊú¨ÂíåÈÄêË°åËØªÂèñÊñáÊú¨Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/shihui512/article/category/1397194Ôºâ[2] Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÂàÜÂâ≤(C++)Ôºàhttp://www.cnblogs.com/MikeZhang/category/345894.htmlÔºâ[3] C++ËØªÂèñÊñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏≠ÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂ÊàñËÄÖÊòØÁâπÂÆöÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/adong76/article/category/1632029Ôºâ[4] C/C++ Âà§Êñ≠Êñá‰ª∂Â§πÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú®‰ª•ÂèäÂàõÂª∫„ÄÅÂà†Èô§Êñá‰ª∂Â§π windows‰ª•ÂèälinuxÈÄöÁî®Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/u012005313/article/category/5586103Ôºâ[5] Split a string in C++?Ôºàhttp://stackoverflow.com/questions/236129/split-a-string-in-cÔºâ[6] KinectÂºÄÂèëÂ≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞‰πãÔºàÂÖ≠ÔºâÂ∏¶Ê∏∏ÊàèËÄÖIDÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶Êï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÊèêÂèñÔºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/zouxy09/article/category/1273380Ôºâ[7] Depth Map TutorialÔºàhttp://www.pages.drexel.edu/~nk752/depthMapTut.htmlÔºâ

entry.content: ÂâçË®Ä Êó¢ÁÑ∂Âú®‰∏ä‰∏ÄÁØá‰∏≠ÊèêÂà∞‰∫ÜÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåShaun Â∞±Âπ≤ËÑÜÊää OpenCV ‰∏≠ËæÉÂ∏∏‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑ‰∏§‰∏™‰ΩøÁî®ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞‰ΩøÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ï‰πü‰∏ÄÂπ∂ËÆ∞ÂΩï‰∏ãÊù•Âêß„ÄÇËØ¥ÊòéÁØáOpenCV ‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî®ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑ‰∏§‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞‰∏∫ÔºöÈº†Ê†á‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂìçÂ∫îÊìç‰ΩúÂáΩÊï∞Ôºövoid cv::setMouseCallback(const string& winname, MouseCallback onMouse, void* userdata = 0);ÂèÇÊï∞ÊµÖËß£Ôºöconst string& winnameÔºöÁ™óÂè£ÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÂØπÂêç‰∏∫winnameÁöÑÁ™óÂè£ÊâßË°åÈº†Ê†á‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂìçÂ∫îÊìç‰ΩúÔºõMouseCallback onMouseÔºöÈº†Ê†áÂìçÂ∫î‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÁõëÂê¨Èº†Ê†áÁöÑÁÇπÂáªÔºåÁßªÂä®ÔºåÊùæÂºÄÔºåÂà§Êñ≠Èº†Ê†áÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÁ±ªÂûãÂπ∂ÂÅöÂá∫Áõ∏Â∫îÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºõvoid* userdataÔºöÂØπÂ∫îÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂèØÈÄâÂèÇÊï∞ÔºåËã•‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂèòÈáèÂèØ‰ª•ÂøΩÁï•ËØ•ÂèÇÊï∞„ÄÇÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞Â£∞Êòé‰∏∫Ôºötypedef void (*MouseCallback)(int event, int x, int y, int flags, void* userdata);ÂèÇÊï∞ÊµÖËß£Ôºöint eventÔºöÈº†Ê†áÊªëÂä®ÔºàCV_EVENT_MOUSEMOVEÔºâ„ÄÅÂ∑¶ÈîÆÂçïÂáªÔºàCV_EVENT_LBUTTONDOWNÔºâ„ÄÅÂè≥ÈîÆÂçïÂáªÔºàCV_EVENT_RBUTTONDOWN ÔºâÁ≠â10ÁßçÈº†Ê†áÁÇπÂáª‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁöÑintÂûã‰ª£Âè∑Ôºõint x, int yÔºöÈº†Ê†á‰Ωç‰∫éÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÔºàxÔºåyÔºâÂùêÊ†á‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåÁ™óÂè£Â∑¶‰∏äËßíÈªòËÆ§‰∏∫ÂéüÁÇπÔºåÂêëÂè≥‰∏∫xÊ≠£ËΩ¥ÔºåÂêë‰∏ã‰∏∫yÊ≠£ËΩ¥Ôºõint flagsÔºöÈº†Ê†áÂ∑¶ÈîÆÊãñÊãΩÔºàCV_EVENT_FLAG_LBUTTONÔºâ„ÄÅÂè≥ÈîÆÊãñÊãΩÔºàCV_EVENT_FLAG_RBUTTONÔºâÁ≠â6ÁßçÈº†Ê†áÊãñÊãΩ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁöÑintÂûã‰ª£Âè∑Ôºõvoid* userdataÔºöÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞ÔºåËã•‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂèòÈáèÂèØ‰ª•ÂøΩÁï•ËØ•ÂèÇÊï∞„ÄÇÂàõÂª∫ÊªëÂä®Êù°ÂáΩÊï∞Ôºöint cv::createTrackbar(const string& trackbarname, const string& winname, int* value, int count, TrackbarCallback onChange=0, void* userdata=0);ÂèÇÊï∞ÊµÖËß£Ôºöconst string& trackbarnameÔºöÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÊªëÂä®Êù°ÂêçÁß∞Ôºõconst string& winnameÔºöÊâÄÂú®Á™óÂè£ÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÂØπÂêç‰∏∫winnameÁöÑÁ™óÂè£Ê∑ªÂä†ÊªëÂä®Êù°Ôºõint* valueÔºöÊªëÂùóÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåÂÖ∂ÂàùÂßãÂÄºÂØπÂ∫îÊªëÂùóÁöÑÂàùÂßã‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºõint countÔºöÊªëÂùóÂèØËææÂà∞ÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ß‰ΩçÁΩÆÁöÑÂÄºÔºåÊªëÂùóÊúÄÂ∞è‰ΩçÁΩÆÁöÑÂÄºÊÄª‰∏∫0ÔºõTrackbarCallback onChangeÔºöÊªëÂä®Êù°‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÂΩìÊªëÂä®Êù°‰∏ä‰ΩçÁΩÆÊîπÂèòÁöÑÊó∂ÔºåÂàôÊâßË°åËØ•ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞Ôºõvoid* userdataÔºöÂØπÂ∫îÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂèØÈÄâÂèÇÊï∞ÔºåËã•‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂèòÈáèÂèØ‰ª•ÂøΩÁï•ËØ•ÂèÇÊï∞„ÄÇÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞Â£∞Êòé‰∏∫Ôºötypedef void (CV_CDECL *TrackbarCallback)(int pos, void* userdata);ÂèÇÊï∞ÊµÖËß£Ôºöint posÔºöÊªëÂä®Êù°ÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂÄºÔºõvoid* userdataÔºöÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞ÔºåËã•‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂèòÈáèÂèØ‰ª•ÂøΩÁï•ËØ•ÂèÇÊï∞„ÄÇ‚ÄªÊ≥®ÔºöÊú¨ÊñáÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞ËØ¥ÊòéÈááÁî®ÁöÑÊòØ opencv-2.4.11 ÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞Â£∞ÊòéÔºå‰∏é opencv-3.2.0 ÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞Â£∞ÊòéÂå∫Âà´Âú®‰∫é string Á±ªÂûãÔºåopencv-3.2.0 ÈááÁî®ÁöÑÊòØÂÖ∂Ëá™Â∑±ÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ String Á±ª„ÄÇÂÆû‰æãÁØáShow u the codeÔºåÂÖ∑‰Ωì C++ ÂÆûÁé∞‰ª£Á†Å‰∏∫Ôºö#include <opencv2/opencv.hpp> #include <opencv2/core/core.hpp>#include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>#include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>// ---------------- Èº†Ê†á‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ ---------------------------------static cv::Mat src_img; // ÂéüÂßãÂõæÂÉèÂÖ®Â±ÄÂèòÈáèstatic void mouseCallback(int event, int x, int y, int flags, void *){ bool selected = false; static cv::Point left_top_vertex, right_down_vertex; // Â∑¶‰∏äËßíÈ°∂ÁÇπÂíåÂè≥‰∏ãËßíÈ°∂ÁÇπ // When the left mouse button is pressed, record its position and save it in corner1 if (event == CV_EVENT_LBUTTONDOWN) // Â∑¶ÈîÆÊåâ‰∏ã { left_top_vertex.x = x; left_top_vertex.y = y; std::cout << "Corner 1 recorded at " << left_top_vertex << std::endl; } // When the left mouse button is released, record its position and save it in corner2 if (event == cv::EVENT_LBUTTONUP) // Â∑¶ÈîÆÂºπËµ∑ { // Also check if user selection is bigger than 20 pixels (jut for fun!) if (abs(x - left_top_vertex.x) > 10 && abs(y - left_top_vertex.y) > 10) { right_down_vertex.x = x; right_down_vertex.y = y; std::cout << "Corner 2 recorded at " << right_down_vertex << std::endl << std::endl; selected = true; } else { std::cout << "Please select a bigger region" << std::endl; } } // Update the box showing the selected region as the user drags the mouse if (flags == CV_EVENT_FLAG_LBUTTON) // Â∑¶ÈîÆÊãñÊãΩ { cv::Point pt; pt.x = x; pt.y = y; cv::Mat local_img = src_img.clone(); rectangle(local_img, left_top_vertex, pt, cv::Scalar(0, 0, 255)); imshow("Cropping app", local_img); } // Define ROI and crop it out when both corners have been selected if (selected) { cv::Rect box; box.width = abs(left_top_vertex.x - right_down_vertex.x); box.height = abs(left_top_vertex.y - right_down_vertex.y); box.x = cv::min(left_top_vertex.x, right_down_vertex.x); box.y = cv::min(left_top_vertex.y, right_down_vertex.y); // Make an image out of just the selected ROI and display it in a new window cv::Mat crop(src_img, box); cv::namedWindow("Crop"); imshow("Crop", crop); }}// ---------- ÂìçÂ∫îÈº†Ê†á‰∫ã‰ª∂ ------------------------------------void setMouseCallbackTest(){ src_img = cv::imread("../data/lena.jpg", CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYDEPTH | CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYCOLOR); cv::namedWindow("Cropping app"); imshow("Cropping app", src_img); // Set the mouse event callback function cv::setMouseCallback("Cropping app", mouseCallback); while (char(cv::waitKey(30)) != 'q') {}}// -------------- ÊªëÂä®Êù°ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ ------------------------static void thresholdCallback(int slider_value, void* gray){ //static_cast<>Áî®‰∫éÂÆâÂÖ®ËΩ¨Êç¢ÊåáÈíà cv::Mat *tmp_gray = static_cast<cv::Mat *>(gray); cv::Mat tmp = *tmp_gray; cv::Mat dst; threshold(tmp, dst, slider_value, 255, CV_THRESH_BINARY); //ÊòæÁ§∫ÊïàÊûúÂõæ cv::imshow("Trackbar Demo", dst);}// ------------ ÂàõÂª∫ÊªëÂä®Êù° ----------------------------------void createTrackbarTest(){ cv::Mat src_gray = cv::imread("../data/lena.jpg", 0); const int max_value = 255; //ÊªëÂä®Êù°ÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ßÂÄº int slider_value = 0; // ÊªëÂä®Êù°ÁöÑÂàùÂßãÂÄº char *window_name = "Trackbar Demo"; char *trackbar_name = "Value:"; // ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Á™óÂè£ÊòæÁ§∫ÂõæÁâá cv::namedWindow(window_name, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE); imshow(window_name, src_gray); // ÂàõÂª∫ÊªëÂä®Êù°Êù•ÊéßÂà∂ÈòàÂÄº createTrackbar(trackbar_name, window_name, &slider_value, max_value, thresholdCallback, &src_gray); while (char(cv::waitKey(30)) != 'q') {}}// ------- Â∞Ü‰∏§‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞Âú®Âêå‰∏Ä‰∏™Á™óÂè£ÊâßË°å ------------void callbackTest(){ src_img = cv::imread("../data/lena.jpg", 0); const int max_value = 255; //ÊªëÂä®Êù°ÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ßÂÄº int slider_value = 0; // ÊªëÂä®Êù°ÁöÑÂàùÂßãÂÄº char *window_name = "Callback Demo"; char *trackbar_name = "Value:"; // ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Á™óÂè£ÊòæÁ§∫ÂõæÁâá cv::namedWindow(window_name, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE); imshow(window_name, src_img); // ÂàõÂª∫ÊªëÂä®Êù°Êù•ÊéßÂà∂ÈòàÂÄº createTrackbar(trackbar_name, window_name, &slider_value, max_value, thresholdCallback, &src_img); // Èº†Ê†á‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂìçÂ∫î cv::setMouseCallback(window_name, mouseCallback); while (char(cv::waitKey(30)) != 'q') {}}int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ //setMouseCallbackTest(); //createTrackbarTest(); callbackTest(); while (char(cv::waitKey(30)) != 'q') {} return 0;} Áªè Shaun ÊµãËØïÔºå‰∏äÈù¢Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂú® Win10 ÁöÑ VS2013 ‰∏≠ opencv-2.4.11 Âíå opencv-3.2.0 ‰∏ãÈÉΩËÉΩÂÆåÁæéËøêË°å„ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ Êú¨Êù•Ëøô‰∏§‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞ÈÉΩÂ∑≤ÁªèÂÜôÔºàchaoÔºâÂ•Ω‰∫ÜÔºå‰ΩÜ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÊõ¥Â•ΩÁöÑ‰ΩìÁé∞Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºåÂèàÁ®ç‰Ωú‰∫Ü‰øÆÊîπÔºöÊ∑ªÂä†Èº†Ê†áÂ∑¶ÈîÆÊãñÊãΩ‰∫ã‰ª∂Âèä‰∏ç‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂèòÈáèÁ≠â„ÄÇÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô[1] opencv2 ‰ΩøÁî®Èº†Ê†áÁªòÂà∂Áü©ÂΩ¢Âπ∂Êà™ÂèñÂíå‰øùÂ≠òÁü©ÂΩ¢Âå∫ÂüüÂõæÂÉèÔºàhttp://www.cnblogs.com/lidabo/category/516776.htmlÔºâ[2] Opencv‰∏≠Ê∑ªÂä†ËøõÂ∫¶Êù°ÂèäÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/weixin_35738542/article/category/6337413Ôºâ[3] OpenCV2‰∏≠ÊªëÂä®Êù°ÔºàTrackbarÔºâÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂ∞èÂèëÁé∞Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/u014291399/article/category/3097955Ôºâ[4] OpenCV GUIÂü∫Êú¨Êìç‰ΩúÔºåÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåËøõÂ∫¶Êù°ÔºåË£ÅÂâ™ÂõæÂÉèÁ≠âÔºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/wangyaninglm/article/category/1653815Ôºâ

processingCallback(); clock_t end_time = clock(); printf(" takes: %fs.\n", (double)(end_time - start_time) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);}void test(){ for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) { printf("Hello World!\n"); } _CALLED_;}int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ computeTotalTime(test); VS ‰∏≠Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂºÄÂèë Qt Á®ãÂ∫èËØ∑ËØ¶ËßÅÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñôÔºåÊáíÁôåÂèë‰ΩúÔºå‰∏çÊÉ≥ÂÜô‰∫Ü =_=ÔºàÂÖ∂ÂÆûÊòØÂõ†‰∏∫Ë¶ÅÂÜôÁöÑËØùÂè™ËÉΩË¥¥Âõæ‰∫ÜÔºåShaun Ë°®Á§∫‰∏çÊÉ≥‰ΩøÁî®ÂõæÁâá (‚ïØÔπè‚ï∞) Ôºâ„ÄÇÈóÆÈ¢òÁØáÈóÆÈ¢òÊèèËø∞ÔºöShaun Âú®Áî® Qt ÊòæÁ§∫ OpenCV ÁöÑ Mat Êï∞ÊçÆÂõæÂÉèÊó∂ÔºåÊúâÊó∂‰ºöÂèëÁîüÊâ≠Êõ≤Áé∞Ë±°ÔºàÂõæÂÉè‰ªéÂØπËßíÁ∫øÂàÜÂºÄÔºå‰∏§ËæπÈ¢†ÂÄíÔºåÊâ≠Êõ≤ÔºâÔºåÊúâÊó∂Âç¥‰∏ç‰ºöÔºå‰∏∫‰∫ÜÊí§‰∫ÜËß£ÂÜ≥ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÊü•ÈòÖ‰∫ÜÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ËµÑÊñôÔºåÁªà‰∫éÂèëÁé∞ÁóáÁªìÊâÄÂú®ÔºåÂéüÊù•ÊòØÂõæÁâáÊï∞ÊçÆÊ†ºÂºè‰∏çÁ¨¶Âêà Qt ÁöÑÂõæÁâáÊï∞ÊçÆÊ†ºÂºè„ÄÇËß£ÂÜ≥ÂäûÊ≥ïÔºöÊ≠£ÊñáÊù•ÂñΩ ~\(‚âß‚ñΩ‚â¶)/~ÔºåÂ∞±‰∏çËØ¥Â∫üËØù‰∫ÜÔºå‚ÄúTalk is cheap. Show you the code‚ÄùÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìÂÆåÊï¥Ê≠£Á°ÆÊòæÁ§∫C++‰ª£Á†Å‰∏∫Ôºö123456789101112131415161718192021222324void showMatWithQtQlabel(const cv::Mat &img, QLabel *label){ // [Qt‰∏≠Áî®QLabelÊòæÁ§∫OpenCV‰∏≠MatÂõæÂÉèÊï∞ÊçÆÂá∫Áé∞Êâ≠Êõ≤Áé∞Ë±°ÁöÑËß£ÂÜ≥](http://lovelittlebean.blog.163.com/blog/static/11658218620125208212189/) QImage q_img; if(img.channels() == 3) // RGB image { q_img = QImage((const uchar*)(img.data), img.cols, img.rows, img.cols*img.channels(), QImage::Format_RGB888).rgbSwapped(); }else if (img.channels() == 4) // RGBA image { q_img = QImage((const uchar*)(img.data), img.cols, img.rows, img.cols*img.channels(), QImage::Format_RGB32); }else // gray image { q_img = QImage((const uchar*)(img.data), img.cols, img.rows, img.cols*img.channels(), QImage::Format_Indexed8); } // -------------- ÂõæÁâáËá™ÈÄÇÂ∫îlabel ------------------- QImage q_label_img = q_img.scaled(label->size(), Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation); // ÂõæÁâáËá™ÈÄÇÂ∫îlabelÂ§ßÂ∞è label->setPixmap(QPixmap::fromImage(q_label_img)); // Â∞ÜÂõæÁâáÊòæÁ§∫Âà∞label‰∏ä // -------------- labelËá™ÈÄÇÂ∫îÂõæÁâá ------------------- /*label->setPixmap(QPixmap::fromImage(q_img)); // ÊòæÁ§∫Âú®label‰∏≠ label->resize(label->pixmap()->size()); // ÊîπÂèòlabelÁöÑÂ∞∫ÂØ∏‰ª•Ëá™ÈÄÇÂ∫îÂõæÂÉè label->show(); */} rgbSwapped() ÂáΩÊï∞ÊòØ‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰Ωø Qt ‰∏≠ÊòæÁ§∫ÂõæÂΩ¢È¢úËâ≤Êõ¥Ëá™ÁÑ∂ÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫ OpenCV ÁöÑ Mat Êï∞ÊçÆ RGB ÂõæÂÉèÊòØ‰ª• BGR ÁöÑÈ°∫Â∫èÊéíÂàóÔºåËÄå Qt ‰∏≠ÊòØ‰ª• RGB ÁöÑÈ°∫Â∫èÊéíÂàóÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÈúÄË¶Å rgbSwapped() ‰∫§Êç¢‰∏Ä‰∏ãÈ¢úËâ≤ÈÄöÈÅìÊéíÂàóÈ°∫Â∫è„ÄÇÈôÑÂΩï1„ÄÅÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥Êï∞ÊçÆÈááÈõÜÈóÆÈ¢òÊ≥®ÊÑèÔºöÂ¶ÇÊûúÊòØ‰ªéÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÂÆûÊó∂ÈááÈõÜÊòæÁ§∫ÂõæÂÉèÔºåÂú®ÊòæÁ§∫Êó∂ÈúÄÂÖàÂà§Êñ≠ÂõæÂÉèÊúâÊ≤°ÊúâÊï∞ÊçÆ1234567if (image.data){ // ÊâßË°åÊòæÁ§∫Êìç‰Ωú showMatWithQtQlabel(mat, ui.label); // ÊâßË°åÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÊìç‰Ωú...}Êàñ1234567if (!image.empty()){ // ÊâßË°åÊòæÁ§∫Êìç‰Ωú showMatWithQtQlabel(mat, ui.label); // ÊâßË°åÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÊìç‰Ωú...}ÂÖ∑‰ΩìÂéüÂõ†ÂèØÂèÇËÄÉ Shaun ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁØáÊñáÁ´† Ëß£ÂÜ≥OpenCV-2.4.11Ë∞ÉÁî®ÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÊòæÁ§∫ÊãçÊëÑËßÜÈ¢ëÂá∫ÈîôÈóÆÈ¢ò „ÄÇ2„ÄÅ‰ø°Âè∑‰∏éÊßΩÁöÑËøûÊé•ÂáΩÊï∞ÈóÆÈ¢òQt4 ‰∏≠‰ø°Âè∑‰∏éÊßΩÁöÑËøûÊé•ÂáΩÊï∞ËØ≠Ê≥ï‰∏∫Ôºö1connect(&theTimer,SIGNAL(timeout()),this,SLOT(getFrame())); // Ë∂ÖÊó∂Â∞±ÂéªÂèñ‰∏ã‰∏ÄÂ∏ßËÄå Qt5 ‰∏≠‰ø°Âè∑‰∏éÊßΩÁöÑËøûÊé•ÂáΩÊï∞Êñ∞ËØ≠Ê≥ï‰∏∫Ôºö1connect(&theTimer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &QtTest::getFrame); //Ë∂ÖÊó∂Â∞±ÂéªÂèñ‰∏ã‰∏ÄÂ∏ßÊé®Ëçê‰ΩøÁî® Qt5 Êñ∞ËØ≠Ê≥ïÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìÂéüÂõ†ÂèØÂèÇËÄÉ qt5‰∏≠‰ø°Âè∑ÂíåÊßΩÁöÑÊñ∞ËØ≠Ê≥ï „ÄÇ‰∏™‰∫∫Á≤óÊµÖÁêÜËß£Ôºö‰ø°Âè∑ÂáΩÊï∞‰∏ÄËà¨ÊòØ Qt ‰∏≠Êéß‰ª∂ÁöÑÂ∫ìÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÊØîÂ¶ÇÊåâÈíÆÊéß‰ª∂ QButton ÁöÑ QButton::clicked () ÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÂÆöÊó∂Âô® QTimer ÁöÑ QTimer::timeout () Á≠âÂáΩÊï∞ÔºõËÄåÊßΩÂáΩÊï∞ÊòØÂìçÂ∫îÂáΩÊï∞Ôºå‰∏ÄËà¨Áî±Áî®Êà∑Ëá™Â∑±ÁºñÂÜôÔºå‰πüÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® Qt ‰∏≠Â∫ìÂáΩÊï∞„ÄÇ ‰ΩøÁî® Qt ‰∏≠ÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÈÅáÂà∞ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∫õÈîôËØØËØ∑ÂèÇËÄÉ ‰ΩøÁî®VS2010ÂºÄÂèëQtÁ®ãÂ∫èÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁÇπÁªèÈ™åÔºàhttp://www.cnblogs.com/csuftzzk/category/445772.htmlÔºâ„ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ Êú¨Êù•ÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂ∞±ÊÉ≥ÊääÈóÆÈ¢òÁØáÂÜôÂá∫Êù•ÁöÑÔºåÊØïÁ´ü‰∏ªË¶ÅÂ∞±ÊòØÊÉ≥ËÆ∞ÂΩï‰∏Ä‰∏ãÈÇ£‰∏™ÊòæÁ§∫ÂáΩÊï∞Ôºå‰ΩÜÊòØÊÑüËßâÊúâÁÇπÊ≤°Â§¥Ê≤°Â∞æÔºåÂ∞±Êää VS ÈõÜÊàê Qt ÂºÄÂèëÁéØÂ¢É‰πüÁ®çÂæÆÂÜô‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºåËÄå‰ΩøÁî®ÁØáÁ°ÆÂÆûÊòØÂõ†‰∏∫ÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñôÂ∑≤ÁªèÂÜôÁöÑÂæàËØ¶ÁªÜ‰∫ÜÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Â∞±Áõ¥Êé•‰∏ÄÁ¨îÂ∏¶Ëøá‰∫Ü„ÄÇÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô[1] QT +openCV ÂÆûÁé∞ÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÈááÈõÜ‰ª•ÂèäÊãçÁÖßÂäüËÉΩÔºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/llh318724/article/category/930663Ôºâ[2] VS2010 + QT5.2+ QT-VS-Addin1.2.2ÂºÄÂèëÁéØÂ¢ÉÈÖçÁΩÆÔºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/qqmindyourwill/article/category/5990841Ôºâ[3] Qt+OpenCVÁïåÈù¢Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/fm0517/article/category/1110960Ôºâ[4] Qt‰∏≠Áî®QLabelÊòæÁ§∫OpenCV‰∏≠MatÂõæÂÉèÊï∞ÊçÆÂá∫Áé∞Êâ≠Êõ≤Áé∞Ë±°ÁöÑËß£ÂÜ≥Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/loveaborn/article/category/1164072Ôºâ

entry.content: Êú¨ÊñáÊâÄÁî®ÁöÑ OpenCV ÁâàÊú¨‰∏∫ opencv-2.4.11ÔºåÁºñÁ®ãËØ≠Ë®Ä‰∏∫ C++„ÄÇÂâçË®Ä Êú¨ÊñáÂÖ∂ÂÆûÊòØ‰ª•ÂâçÂú®ÂàöÂ≠¶ OpenCV Êó∂ÈÅáÂà∞ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÂΩìÊó∂ÊàëÁöÑÁéØÂ¢ÉËøòÊòØÔºöWin7ÔºåVS2010Ôºåopencv-2.4.11„ÄÇÂΩìÂàùÂ∞±ËÆ∞ÂΩï‰∫Ü‰∏ãÊù•ÔºåÁé∞Âú®ÂÜçÊù•ÈáçÊñ∞Ê¢≥ÁêÜ‰∏Ä‰∏ã„ÄÇÈóÆÈ¢òÁØáÈóÆÈ¢òÊèèËø∞Ôºö‰ΩøÁî® OpenCV-2.4.11 Ë∞ÉÁî®ÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÊòæÁ§∫ÊãçÊëÑËßÜÈ¢ëÊó∂Êä• runtime errorÔºåÊéßÂà∂Âè∞Á™óÂè£Âá∫Áé∞ OpenCV Error: Assertion failed (size.width>0 && size.height>0) in cv::imshow, file ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶...cpp, line 261„ÄÇËß£ÂÜ≥ÂäûÊ≥ïÔºöÂú®ÊòæÁ§∫ÂõæÁâáÊó∂ÂÖàÂà§Êñ≠ÊòØÂê¶ÊúâÂõæÂÉèÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö1234if (!image.empty()) { imshow("window", image);}Êàñ1234if (image.data) { imshow("window", image);}ÂéüÂõ†ÂèØËÉΩÊòØÔºöÁî® imshow() ÊòæÁ§∫ÂõæÂÉèÊó∂ÔºåÂÖ∂ image ÂøÖÈ°ªÊúâÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂÆÉ‰∏∫Á©∫ÂàôÁ®ãÂ∫è‰ºöÊä•ÈîôÔºåËÄå‰∏ÄËà¨ÊâìÂºÄÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥‰ºöÊúâ‰∏ÄÂÆöÊó∂Èó¥ÁöÑÂª∂ËøüÔºåËøôÊó∂Á®ãÂ∫èÂ∑≤ÁªèÂêØÂä®ÔºåËÄåÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥Áî±‰∫éÂêØÂä®Âª∂ËøüÔºå‰∏ç‰∏ÄÂÆöËÉΩÂèäÊó∂Ëé∑ÂèñÂõæÂÉèÔºåÈÄ†ÊàêË¶ÅÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑ image ‰∏∫Á©∫ÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§Êä•Èîô„ÄÇ‰∏™‰∫∫Á≤óÊµÖÁêÜËß£ÔºåÊùøÁ†ñËΩªÊãç ‚äôÔπè‚äôb„ÄÇËÄåÁΩë‰∏äÊúâ‰∫∫‰πüËÆ§‰∏∫ÔºöÊàë‰πüÊòØÈÅáÂà∞Ëøô‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºå‰∏çËøáÁúãÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∏ñÂ≠êÂÜôÂæó‰∏çÈîôÔºàËã±ÊñáÁöÑÔºâÔºåÈáåÈù¢ÁªôÂá∫‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂèØËÉΩÁöÑÁêÜÁî±ÔºåÂ∞±ÊòØÊàë‰ª¨Áî® opencv ÊâìÂºÄËßÜÈ¢ëÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºå‰ºöËá™Âä®ÂÖàÁõëÊµãÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÊúâÊ≤°ÊúâËØªÂà∞Â∏ßÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊ≤°ÊúâÔºåÂ∞±‰ºöÊä•ÈîôÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂÜçÊâßË°å‰Ω†ÁöÑÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºåÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™ifÂà§Êñ≠Â∞±ÊòØË∑≥ËøáÁ≥ªÁªüËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂà§Êñ≠ÔºåÁõ¥Êé•ÊâßË°åÊàë‰ª¨ÁöÑÁ®ãÂ∫è„ÄÇÊù•Ëá™Ôºöhttps://zhidao.baidu.com/question/1831122325089024420.htmlÊúâ‰∫∫ËØ¥ÁöÑÂéüÂõ†ÊòØÂú® VideoCapture ÂàöÂºÄÂßãËé∑ÂèñÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ËßÜÈ¢ëÊµÅÁöÑËøáÁ®ã‰∏çËøîÂõû‰ø°Âè∑ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Âà§Êñ≠ Mat ÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫Á©∫ÔºåÂπ∂‰∏çÊñ≠Âæ™ÁéØÂéªËé∑Âèñ Mat„ÄÇÊù•Ëá™Ôºöhttp://www.cnblogs.com/tiny656/p/3538115.htmlÈôÑÊúÄÁªàÂÆåÊï¥Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºö12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940#include <opencv2/core/core.hpp> #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp> #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>// Ë∞ÉÁî®ÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥void videoCaptureTest(){ //cv::VideoCapture cap(0); // ÊâìÂºÄÈªòËÆ§ÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÔºåÂèÇÊï∞0‰ª£Ë°®ÈªòËÆ§ÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÁöÑID cv::VideoCapture cap; cap.open(0); // ËÆæÁΩÆÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ cap.set(CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH,640); cap.set(CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT,480); // Á°ÆËÆ§ÊòØÂê¶ÊàêÂäüÊâìÂºÄÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ if (!cap.isOpened()) { printf("ÊâìÂºÄÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥Â§±Ë¥•ÔºåÈÄÄÂá∫ÔºÅ\n"); exit(-1); } cv::namedWindow("Capture", CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE|CV_WINDOW_FREERATIO); while (1) { cv::Mat frame; cap >> frame; // Ëé∑ÂèñÂ∏ß // ÂØπÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥Ëé∑ÂèñÁöÑÂ∏ßËøõË°åÂêÑÁßçÂ§ÑÁêÜ if (!frame.empty()) // ÊúÄÂ•ΩÂä†‰∏äËØ•Âà§Êñ≠ÔºåÂπ∂Âú®ËØ•Âà§Êñ≠‰∏≠ÂØπÂ∏ßËøõË°åÂ§ÑÁêÜ { cv::imshow("Capture", frame); } if(cv::waitKey(30) >= 0) break; // ÊØè30msÂèñ‰∏ÄÂ∏ß }}int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ videoCaptureTest(); return 0;} ÂÖ∂ÂÆû‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÂú®Ëé∑ÂèñÂ∏ßÊó∂ÔºåÂèçÂ§çËé∑ÂèñÂ∏ßÔºåÁõ¥Âà∞ÂèñÂà∞ÁöÑÂ∏ßÊúâÊï∞ÊçÆ‰∏∫Ê≠¢ÔºåËøôÊ†∑Â∞±‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÂà§Êñ≠ËØ≠Âè•‰∫ÜÔºåÁõ¥Êé•ÊòæÁ§∫Âç≥ÂèØÔºåÂÖ∑‰Ωì‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö123456do{ cap >> frame;}while(frame.empty());cv::imshow("Capture", frame);ÂèÇËÄÉËá™Ôºöhttps://stackoverflow.com/a/9285151 „ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ Êú¨ÊñáËøòÊòØÂΩìÂàùÂú®ÂõΩÂÜÖÊüêÂπ≥Âè∞ÂÜôÂçöÂÆ¢Êó∂ÂÜôÁöÑÔºå‰ΩÜÁé∞Âú®ÂÜçÂõûÂ§¥ÁúãÔºåÂèàÁ®çÂæÆÊúâ‰∫ÜÁÇπÊñ∞ÁöÑÊÄùË∑ØÔºåÊ∏©ÊïÖÁ°ÆÂÆûËÉΩÁü•Êñ∞ (*^__^*) ÂòªÂòª‚Ä¶‚Ä¶„ÄÇÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô[1] OpenCV2.3‰ΩøÁî®ÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÂíåËßÜÈ¢ëÔºàhttp://blog.sina.com.cn/s/articlelist_2749877462_3_1.htmlÔºâ[2] OpenCV Error: Assertion failed (size.width>0 && size.height>0) in cv::imshow, fi Ëøô‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÊÄé‰πàÂäûÔºü[3] OpenCVÊâìÂºÄÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥Âá∫Áé∞ËøêË°åÈîôËØØOpenCV ErrorÔºöAssertion failed (size.width>0&&size.height>0)in cv::imshowÔºå‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/czl389/article/category/6381887Ôºâ[4] [OpenCV]Ëé∑ÂèñÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ËßÜÈ¢ëÔºàhttp://www.cnblogs.com/tiny656/category/550972.htmlÔºâ

ÂáèÂ∞èÔºàÂ¶Ç‰∏äÈù¢‰ª£Á†Å‰∏≠ÁöÑÊ≥®ÈáäÔºâÔºåËøôÊ†∑Á°ÆÂÆûËÉΩËÆ© 3D Âú∞ÁêÉÊòæÁ§∫ÂÆåÂÖ®Ôºå‰ΩÜÊúâÁÇπÂ∞èÔºå‰∏çÊòØÂæàÂ•ΩÁúãÔºõÂêéÈù¢ÊÉ≥Âà∞Ê≤°ÊòæÁ§∫ÂÆåÂÖ®ÂèØËÉΩÊòØ‰∏äÂ±Ç divÔºà.switch-areaÔºâÂ§™Â∞è‰∏îËÆæÁΩÆ‰∫Ü overflow: hidden;Ôºå‰∫éÊòØËøôÈáå Shaun È¶ñÂÖàÂ¢ûÂä†‰∫Ü .switch-area ÁöÑÈ´òÂ∫¶ÔºåËøôÊ†∑Á°ÆÂÆûËÉΩËß£ÂÜ≥ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºå‰ΩÜ‰ºö‰ΩøÂ∑¶Ê†èÁöÑÊªöÂä®Êù°ÊòæÁ§∫Âá∫Êù•ÔºõÊâÄ‰ª• Shaun Êé•ÁùÄÂ∞ùËØïÂ∞Ü .switch-area ÁöÑ overflow: hidden; Ê≥®ÈáäÊéâÔºåË∞ÅÊÉ≥Ê≥®ÈáäÊéâ‰πãÂêéÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜÊ®™ÂêëÊªöÂä®Êù°ÔºåËøôÊ†∑Êõ¥‰∏çÂ•Ω‰∫ÜÔºå‰∫éÊòØ Shaun ÂèàÊõ¥Êîπ‰∏∫ overflow-x: hidden; ÔºåË∞ÅÊÉ≥ .switch-area ÂèàÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜÁ´ñÁõ¥ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÔºàÊÑüËßâÂÉèÊãÜ‰∏úÂ¢ôË°•Ë•øÂ¢ô -_-|||ÔºâÔºåÊü•ÈòÖÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ËµÑÊñôÔºàCSS-overflowÁâπÊÄßÂèäÊÄªÁªìÔºâÂæóÁü•Ëã• overflow-x ‰∏∫ hiddenÔºåoverflow-y ‰∏ç‰∏∫ hiddenÔºåÂàô overflow-y Â∞Ü‰ºöËá™Âä®ÈáçÁΩÆ‰∏∫ autoÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ËøôÈáå‰∏çËÉΩËøôÊ†∑ÊîπÔºå‰ΩÜ overflow: hidden; ËøòÊòØÂæóÊ≥®ÈáäÊéâÔºå‰∏çÁÑ∂‰∏äÂ±Ç div Êíë‰∏çÂºÄÔºåËÄå‰∏î‰∏çÂ¢ûÂä†È´òÂ∫¶ÁöÑËØùÔºåËøòÊòØ‰∏çËÉΩÂÆåÂÖ®ÊòæÁ§∫ 3D Âú∞ÁêÉÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Ë∂ÖÂá∫Â∞±ÈöêËóè‰∫ÜÂòõÔºõÂõ†‰∏∫Ê≥®ÈáäÊéâ‰πãÂêé‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞Ê®™ÂêëÊªöÂä®Êù°ÔºåËÄåÂèà‰∏çËÉΩ‰øÆÊîπ .switch-area ÁöÑ overflow-xÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Â∞±Âè™ËÉΩÊîπÊõ¥‰∏äÂ±ÇÁöÑ divÔºåËøôÈáå Shaun Á™ÅÁÑ∂ÊÉ≥Ëµ∑‰∏äÊ¨°ÁªôÂ∑¶Ê†èÊ∑ªÂä†ÊªöÂä®Êù°Êó∂ÔºåÂú® .left-col ‰∏ãÊ∑ªÂä†‰∫Ü overflow: auto;ÔºåËøôÊ¨°‰∏çÂ¶ÇËøò‰øÆÊîπËøôÈáåÔºåÊØïÁ´ü Shaun Âè™ÊÉ≥Ë¶ÅÁ´ñÁõ¥ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÔºàÂÖ∂ÂÆû‰∏çË¶ÅÊªöÂä®Êù°Âç¥ËÉΩÊªöÂä®ÊúÄÂ•ΩÔºå‰ΩÜ Shaun ÁõÆÂâçËøòÊ≤°ÊâæÂà∞Â•ΩÁöÑËß£ÂÜ≥ÊñπÊ°à (‚ïØÔπè‚ï∞)bÔºâÔºå‰∏çË¶ÅÊ®™ÂêëÊªöÂä®Êù°Ôºå‰∫éÊòØÂ∞ÜÂÖ∂‰øÆÊîπ‰∏∫Ôºö12overflow-y: auto;overflow-x: hidden;Ê≤°ÊÉ≥Âà∞ËøôÊ†∑‰πüËÉΩËß£ÂÜ≥ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåËôΩÁÑ∂ËøòÊòØ‰ºöÂú®Â∑¶Ê†èÂá∫Áé∞ÊªöÂä®Êù°Ôºå‰ΩÜËøôÊ†∑ÊÑüËßâÊØîÂ¢ûÂä† .switch-area ÁöÑÈ´òÂ∫¶Ë¶ÅÂ•ΩÔºàÂóØÔºåÂ∫îËØ•Ë¶ÅÂ•ΩÂêß (ÔΩû o ÔΩû)YÔºâ„ÄÇÁúã‰ª•ÂêéËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩÊîπÊàêÁÇπÂáª‚ÄúËÆøÈóÆÊÉÖÂÜµ‚ÄùÊó∂ÊâçÂá∫Áé∞ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÔºåÁÇπÂáªÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÂàóË°®Âàô‰∏çÂá∫Áé∞ÊªöÂä®Êù°ÔºàÂÖ∂ÂÆûÊääÊªöÂä®Êù°ÈöêËóèÊúÄÂ•ΩÔºå‰ΩÜÁΩë‰∏äÈÇ£‰∏™‰∏§‰∏™ div ÂµåÂ•óÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï Shaun Â∞ùËØïËøá‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞‰∏Ä‰∫õÂ•áÊÄ™ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÁ≠â‰ª•ÂêéÂÜçËØïËØïÂêß ‚Üñ((^œâ^)‚ÜóÔºâ„ÄÇÂæÖÁª≠„ÄÇ„ÄÇ„ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ ÁõÆÂâçÂ∞±Ê∑ªÂä†Ëøô‰∫õÂ∞èÁªÑ‰ª∂Ôºå‰ª•ÂêéÂ∫îËØ•‰ºöÈôÜÁª≠Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∫õÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÁöÑÂ∞è‰∏úË•ø ‚Üñ(^œâ^)‚Üó„ÄÇÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô[1] Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂú®Ëá™Â∑±ÁΩëÁ´ô‰∏äÊàñËÄÖÂçöÂÆ¢‰∏äÊîæÁΩÆQQÈÇÆÁÆ±ËÅîÁ≥ªÂèçÈ¶àÔºàhttp://jingyan.baidu.com/tag?tagName=%E9%82%AE%E7%AE%B1Ôºâ[2] Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂú®Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂçöÂÆ¢Ê∑ªÂä†QQÁªÑ‰ª∂Ôºàhttp://www.29mo.com/category/wltgÔºâ[3] ‰∏ÄÊ≠•‰∏ÄÊ≠•Êïô‰Ω†ÁªôËá™Â∑±ÂçöÂÆ¢Ê∑ªÂä†QQÂú®Á∫øÔºàhttp://www.feizl.com/feizhuliu/QQbaodian/Ôºâ

entry.title: OpenCV‰∏≠ÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÁÆóÊ≥ïÁöÑ‰ΩøÁî®
entry.content: Êú¨ÊñáÊâÄÁî®ÁöÑ OpenCV ÁâàÊú¨‰∏∫ opencv-3.2.0ÔºåÁºñÁ®ãËØ≠Ë®Ä‰∏∫ C++„ÄÇÂâçË®Ä OpenCV ‰∏≠ÂÆûÁé∞‰∫Ü‰∏§ÁßçÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÁÆóÊ≥ïÔºåÂàÜÂà´‰∏∫ Spectral Residual ÁÆóÊ≥ï,Âá∫Ëá™ Xiaodi Hou and Liqing Zhang. Saliency detection: A spectral residual approach. In Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition, 2007. CVPR‚Äô07. IEEE Conference on, pages 1‚Äì8. IEEE, 2007. Âíå Fine Grained Saliency ÁÆóÊ≥ï,Âá∫Ëá™ Sebastian Montabone and Alvaro Soto. Human detection using a mobile platform and novel features derived from a visual saliency mechanism. In Image and Vision Computing, Vol. 28 Issue 3, pages 391‚Äì402. Elsevier, 2010.„ÄÇËøô‰∏§ÁßçÁÆóÊ≥ïÂêåÊ†∑ÊòØÂú®Êâ©Â±ïÂåÖ opencv_contrib-3.2.0 ‰∏≠Ôºå‰πüÊòØÁî±‰∫é opencv ÂÆòÊñπÁ§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂØπÂàùÂ≠¶ËÄÖ‰∏çÂèãÂ•ΩÔºà‰∏ªË¶ÅÊòØ Shaun Â¢ÉÁïå‰∏çÂ§ü o(‚ïØ‚ñ°‚ï∞)oÔºâÔºåÊâÄ‰ª• Shaun ÂØπÁÖßÂÖ∂ÂÆòÊñπÊñáÊ°£ÈáçÊñ∞Êï¥ÁêÜ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏ã„ÄÇËØ¥ÊòéÁØá ‰ΩøÁî® OpenCV ‰∏≠ÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÁÆóÊ≥ïËøõË°åÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÂçÅÂàÜÊñπ‰æøÁÆÄÊ¥ÅÔºåÂà©Áî®‰ª•‰∏ã‰∏â‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞Â∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÔºöÂàõÂª∫ Spectral Residual ÁÆóÊ≥ïÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÂØπË±°Ôºöstatic Ptr<StaticSaliencySpectralResidual> cv::saliency::StaticSaliencySpectralResidual::create();Spectral Residual ÁÆóÊ≥ïËÆ°ÁÆóÊòæËëóÊÄßÂõæÔºöbool cv::saliency::StaticSaliencySpectralResidual::computeSaliency(InputArray image, OutputArray saliencyMap);Fine Grained Saliency ÁÆóÊ≥ïÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞Â£∞ÊòéÂêå Spectral Residual ÁÆóÊ≥ïÁ±ª‰ºº„ÄÇËÆ°ÁÆóÊòæËëóÊÄßÂõæÁöÑ‰∫åÂÄºÂõæÔºöbool cv::saliency::StaticSaliency::computeBinaryMap(InputArray _saliencyMap, OutputArray _binaryMap) ;ÂÖ∑‰Ωì‰ΩøÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ïÂèØÂèÇËÄÉÂÆû‰æãÁØá„ÄÇÂÆû‰æãÁØá ‰ΩøÁî® OpenCV ‰∏≠ÁöÑÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÁÆóÊ≥ïÈúÄË¶ÅÂåÖÂê´Â§¥Êñá‰ª∂#include <opencv2/saliency.hpp>ÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìÁ§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö#include <opencv2/opencv.hpp>#include <opencv2/saliency.hpp>//******************************************************// [opencv_contrib/modules/saliency/src/saliency.cpp](https://github.com/opencv/opencv_contrib/blob/b7dcf141507edbe544e75820c76769a7769223ac/modules/saliency/src/saliency.cpp)////Ptr<Saliency> Saliency::create(const String& saliencyType)//{// if (saliencyType == "SPECTRAL_RESIDUAL")// return makePtr<StaticSaliencySpectralResidual>(); //computeSaliencyËøîÂõûÁöÑÊòØ32FC1// else if (saliencyType == "FINE_GRAINED")// return makePtr<StaticSaliencyFineGrained>(); //computeSaliencyËøîÂõûÁöÑÊòØ8UC1// else if (saliencyType == "BING")// return makePtr<ObjectnessBING>();// else if (saliencyType == "BinWangApr2014")// return makePtr<MotionSaliencyBinWangApr2014>();// return Ptr<Saliency>();//}//// [opencv_contrib/modules/saliency/src/staticSaliency.cpp](https://github.com/opencv/opencv_contrib/blob/41b0a71ac826b1489d3e5c208ac7a95e58556caf/modules/saliency/src/staticSaliency.cpp)//computeBinaryMap()Ë¶ÅÊ±ÇËæìÂÖ•ÁöÑsaliencyMap‰∏∫ÊµÆÁÇπÊï∞Ôºàeg:32FC1Ôºâ//*****************************************************void spectralResidualTest(){ cv::Mat src_img = cv::imread("../data/true.png", CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYDEPTH | CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYCOLOR); // ËΩΩÂÖ•ÊúÄÁúüÂÆûÁöÑÂéüÂßãÂõæÂÉè cv::namedWindow("src_img", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("src_img", src_img); // [OpenCVÂÆûÁé∞ÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµã‰∏≠ÁöÑË∞±ÊÆãÂ∑ÆÊ≥ïÔºàSpectral Residual MethodÔºâÊ∂âÂèäÂà∞‰∫ÜÂÇÖÁ´ãÂè∂Ê≠£ÂèçÂèòÊç¢](http://blog.csdn.net/kena_m/article/details/49406687) if (src_img.empty()) exit(-1); if (src_img.channels() == 3) cv::cvtColor(src_img, src_img, CV_BGR2GRAY); cv::Mat planes[] = { cv::Mat_<float>(src_img), cv::Mat::zeros(src_img.size(), CV_32F) }; cv::Mat complex_img; //Â§çÊï∞Áü©Èòµ merge(planes, 2, complex_img); //ÊääÂçïÈÄöÈÅìÁü©ÈòµÁªÑÂêàÊàêÂ§çÊï∞ÂΩ¢ÂºèÁöÑÂèåÈÄöÈÅìÁü©Èòµ dft(complex_img, complex_img); // ‰ΩøÁî®Á¶ªÊï£ÂÇÖÁ´ãÂè∂ÂèòÊç¢ //ÂØπÂ§çÊï∞Áü©ÈòµËøõË°åÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏∫Ë∞±ÊÆãÂ∑Æ cv::Mat magnitude, phase_angle, mag_mean; cv::Mat real_part, imaginary_part; split(complex_img, planes); //ÂàÜÁ¶ªÂ§çÊï∞Âà∞ÂÆûÈÉ®ÂíåËôöÈÉ® real_part = planes[0]; //ÂÆûÈÉ® imaginary_part = planes[1]; //ËôöÈÉ® cv::magnitude(real_part, imaginary_part, magnitude); //ËÆ°ÁÆóÂπÖÂÄº phase(real_part, imaginary_part, phase_angle); //ËÆ°ÁÆóÁõ∏Ëßí float *pre, *pim, *pm, *pp; //ÂØπÂπÖÂÄºËøõË°åÂØπÊï∞Âåñ for (int i = 0; i < magnitude.rows; i++) { pm = magnitude.ptr<float>(i); for (int j = 0; j < magnitude.cols; j++) { *pm = log(*pm); pm++; } } blur(magnitude, mag_mean, cv::Size(5, 5)); //ÂØπÊï∞Ë∞±ÁöÑÂùáÂÄºÊª§Ê≥¢ magnitude = magnitude - mag_mean; //Ê±ÇÂèñÂØπÊï∞È¢ëË∞±ÊÆãÂ∑Æ //ÊääÂØπÊï∞Ë∞±ÊÆãÂ∑ÆÁöÑÂπÖÂÄºÂíåÁõ∏ËßíÂàíÂΩíÂà∞Â§çÊï∞ÂΩ¢Âºè for (int i = 0; i < magnitude.rows; i++) { pre = real_part.ptr<float>(i); pim = imaginary_part.ptr<float>(i); pm = magnitude.ptr<float>(i); pp = phase_angle.ptr<float>(i); for (int j = 0; j < magnitude.cols; j++) { *pm = exp(*pm); *pre = *pm * cos(*pp); *pim = *pm * sin(*pp); pre++; pim++; pm++; pp++; } } cv::Mat planes1[] = { cv::Mat_<float>(real_part), cv::Mat_<float>(imaginary_part) }; merge(planes1, 2, complex_img); //ÈáçÊñ∞Êï¥ÂêàÂÆûÈÉ®ÂíåËôöÈÉ®ÁªÑÊàêÂèåÈÄöÈÅìÂΩ¢ÂºèÁöÑÂ§çÊï∞Áü©Èòµ idft(complex_img, complex_img, cv::DFT_SCALE); // ÂÇÖÁ´ãÂè∂ÂèçÂèòÊç¢ split(complex_img, planes); //ÂàÜÁ¶ªÂ§çÊï∞Âà∞ÂÆûÈÉ®ÂíåËôöÈÉ® real_part = planes[0]; imaginary_part = planes[1]; cv::magnitude(real_part, imaginary_part, magnitude); //ËÆ°ÁÆóÂπÖÂÄºÂíåÁõ∏Ëßí for (int i = 0; i < magnitude.rows; i++) { pm = magnitude.ptr<float>(i); for (int j = 0; j < magnitude.cols; j++) { *pm = (*pm) * (*pm); pm++; } } GaussianBlur(magnitude, magnitude, cv::Size(7, 7), 2.5, 2.5); cv::Mat invDFT, invDFTcvt; normalize(magnitude, invDFT, 0, 255, cv::NORM_MINMAX); //ÂΩí‰∏ÄÂåñÂà∞[0,255]‰æõÊòæÁ§∫ invDFT.convertTo(invDFTcvt, CV_8U); //ËΩ¨ÂåñÊàêCV_8UÂûã cv::namedWindow("SpectualResidual", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("SpectualResidual", invDFTcvt); cv::Mat thresholded; cv::threshold(invDFTcvt, thresholded, 0, 255, CV_THRESH_OTSU); cv::namedWindow("Thresholded Image", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("Thresholded Image", thresholded); cv::Mat eroded; // Á∫µÂêëËÖêËöÄ cv::erode(thresholded, eroded, cv::Mat(5, 1, CV_8UC1, cv::Scalar(1)), cv::Point(-1, -1), 3); // cv::Point(-1,-1)‰∏∫ÈªòËÆ§ÂèÇÊï∞Ôºå‰ª£Ë°®ÂéüÁÇπÔºàÊèèÁÇπÔºâ‰∏∫Áü©Èòµ‰∏≠ÂøÉ cv::namedWindow("eroded Image", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("eroded Image", eroded); //cv::Mat thresholded; cv::threshold(eroded, thresholded, 60, 255, CV_THRESH_BINARY); cv::namedWindow("Thresholded eroded Image", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("Thresholded eroded Image", thresholded);} // ÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÁÆóÊ≥ïÂü∫Á±ªvoid saliencyTest(){ cv::Mat src_img = cv::imread("../data/true.png", CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYDEPTH | CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYCOLOR); cv::namedWindow("src_img", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("src_img", src_img); if (src_img.empty()) exit(-1); if (src_img.channels() == 3) cv::cvtColor(src_img, src_img, CV_BGR2GRAY); cv::Ptr<cv::saliency::Saliency> saliency_algorithm = cv::saliency::Saliency::create("SPECTRAL_RESIDUAL"); // FINE_GRAINED‰∏∫Fine Grained SaliencyÁÆóÊ≥ï cv::Mat saliency_map; if (saliency_algorithm->computeSaliency(src_img, saliency_map)) // ËÆ°ÁÆóÊòæËëóÊÄßÂõæ { cv::namedWindow("SR saliency map", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("SR saliency map", saliency_map); cv::Mat saliency_map_show(saliency_map.size(), CV_8UC1); normalize(saliency_map, saliency_map_show, 0, 255, CV_MINMAX); //ÂΩí‰∏ÄÂåñÂà∞[0,255]‰æõÊòæÁ§∫ saliency_map_show.convertTo(saliency_map_show, CV_8U); //ËΩ¨ÂåñÊàêCV_8UÂûã cv::namedWindow("saliency_map_show", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("saliency_map_show", saliency_map_show); cv::Mat binary_map; cv::saliency::StaticSaliencySpectralResidual spec; if (spec.computeBinaryMap(saliency_map, binary_map)) // ÂØπÊòæËëóÊÄßÂõæËøõË°å‰∫åÂÄºÂåñ { cv::namedWindow("binary map", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("binary map", binary_map); } }}// Fine Grained SaliencyÁÆóÊ≥ïvoid FGSTest(){ cv::Mat src_img = cv::imread("../data/true.png", CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYDEPTH | CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYCOLOR); cv::namedWindow("src_img", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("src_img", src_img); if (src_img.empty()) exit(-1); if (src_img.channels() == 3) cv::cvtColor(src_img, src_img, CV_BGR2GRAY); cv::Ptr<cv::saliency::StaticSaliencyFineGrained> fgs = cv::saliency::StaticSaliencyFineGrained::create(); cv::Mat fgs_saliency_map; fgs->computeSaliency(src_img, fgs_saliency_map); cv::namedWindow("FGS saliency map", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("FGS saliency map", fgs_saliency_map); //cv::imwrite("../data/T_S.png", fgs_saliency_map); cv::Mat binary_map; cv::threshold(fgs_saliency_map, binary_map, 0, 255, CV_THRESH_OTSU); cv::namedWindow("binary map", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("binary map", binary_map); //cv::imwrite("../data/T_S_B.png", binary_map);}// Spectral ResidualÁÆóÊ≥ïvoid SRTest(){ cv::Mat src_img = cv::imread("../data/true.png", CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYDEPTH | CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYCOLOR); cv::namedWindow("src_img", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("src_img", src_img); if (src_img.empty()) exit(-1); if (src_img.channels() == 3) cv::cvtColor(src_img, src_img, CV_BGR2GRAY); cv::Ptr<cv::saliency::StaticSaliencySpectralResidual> sr = cv::saliency::StaticSaliencySpectralResidual::create(); cv::Mat sr_saliency_map; sr->computeSaliency(src_img, sr_saliency_map); cv::namedWindow("SR saliency map", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("SR saliency map", sr_saliency_map); cv::Mat binary_map; sr->computeBinaryMap(sr_saliency_map, binary_map); cv::namedWindow("binary map", CV_WND_PROP_ASPECTRATIO); cv::imshow("binary map", binary_map);}int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ //spectralResidualTest(); //saliencyTest(); //FGSTest(); SRTest(); while (cv::waitKey(0) != 27) { } return 0;}‰ª•‰∏ä‰ª£Á†ÅÂú® Win10 VS2013 ‰∏≠ÁºñËØëËøêË°åÊàêÂäü„ÄÇ ËøôÈáåÈù¢Êúâ‰∏™Â∞è‰∏úË•øÈúÄË¶ÅÊ≥®ÊÑèÔºåÂ∞±ÊòØ computeBinaryMap() ÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÁúãÂÖ∂ÊñáÊ°£ÊèèËø∞ÂÖ∂‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî® K-means ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂíå Otsu ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂØπÊòæËëóÊÄßÂõæËøõË°å‰∫åÂÄºÂåñÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÂÖ∂ËæìÂÖ•ÁöÑÊòæËëóÊÄßÂõæÊï∞ÊçÆÁ±ªÂûãÂ∫îËØ•‰∏∫ÊµÆÁÇπÊï∞ÔºåOpenCV ‰∏≠ Spectral Residual ÁÆóÊ≥ï computeSaliency() ËøîÂõûÁöÑÁªìÊûú‰∏∫ÊµÆÁÇπÊï∞ÔºåËÄå Fine Grained Saliency ÁÆóÊ≥ï computeSaliency() ËøîÂõûÁöÑÁªìÊûúÂç¥ÊòØÊï¥ÂûãÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Ëøô‰∏ÄÁÇπÈúÄË¶ÅÊ≥®ÊÑè Fine Grained Saliency ÁÆóÊ≥ïËøîÂõûÁöÑÁªìÊûú‰∏çËÉΩÁõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî® computeBinaryMap() ÂáΩÊï∞Ôºå‰∏ÄËà¨ÂØπÂÖ∂ÁªìÊûúÁõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî® OTSU ÁÆóÊ≥ïËøõË°åÈòàÂÄºÂàÜÂâ≤Âç≥ÂèØ„ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ Êú¨Êñá‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑËøô‰∏§ÁßçÁÆóÊ≥ïÂú® Shaun ÁöÑÁîµËÑë‰∏äËøêË°åÊó∂Èó¥ÈÉΩËæÉÈïøÔºåÂü∫Êú¨‰∏çÂèØËÉΩÁî®Êù•Â§ÑÁêÜËßÜÈ¢ëÊµÅÔºåËÄå‰∏îÂú® Shaun ÁöÑËøôÊ¨°ÂÆûÈ™å‰∏≠ÊïàÊûú‰πü‰∏çÂ§™ÁêÜÊÉ≥ÔºåÊØïÁ´üËøôÊòØÁî®Êù•Â§ÑÁêÜÈùôÊÄÅÂõæÂÉèÁöÑ‰∏§ÁßçÊòæËëóÊÄßÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ‰∏çËøá OpenCV ‰∏≠‰πüÊúâÁî®Êù•Â§ÑÁêÜËßÜÈ¢ëÊµÅÁöÑÊòæËëóÊÄßÊ£ÄÊµãÁÆóÊ≥ïÔºåÂÖ∂‰∏∫ BING ÁÆóÊ≥ï,Âá∫Ëá™Ming-Ming Cheng, Ziming Zhang, Wen-Yan Lin, and Philip Torr. Bing: Binarized normed gradients for objectness estimation at 300fps. In IEEE CVPR, 2014.ÔºåÂÆûÈôÖ‰∏äËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçÂø´ÈÄüÊèêÂèñÁõÆÊ†áÂÄôÈÄâÊ°ÜÁöÑÁÆóÊ≥ï„ÄÇ

entry.title: OpenCV‰∏≠Selective SearchÁÆóÊ≥ïÁöÑ‰ΩøÁî®
entry.content: Êú¨ÊñáÊâÄÁî®ÁöÑ OpenCV ÁâàÊú¨‰∏∫ opencv-3.2.0ÔºåÁºñÁ®ãËØ≠Ë®Ä‰∏∫ C++„ÄÇÂâçË®Ä OpenCV-3.2 ‰∏≠ÁöÑ Selective Search ÁÆóÊ≥ïÊòØÂú®ÂÖ∂Êâ©Â±ïÂåÖ‰∏≠ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Ë¶ÅÊÉ≥‰ΩøÁî®ËØ•ÁÆóÊ≥ïÈúÄËá™Ë°åÁºñËØë opencv_contrib-3.2.0„ÄÇÁî±‰∫éÊâ©Â±ïÂåÖ‰∏≠ÁöÑÁ§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÊúâÁÇπÁÆÄÈôãÔºåÂØπÂàùÂ≠¶ËÄÖ‰πü‰∏çÂèãÂ•ΩÔºàShaun ÁºñÁ®ãÊ∞¥Âπ≥ÊúâÈôêÔºåÁ≤óÊµÖËØÑ‰ª∑ÔºåÂãøÊÄ™ (*^__^ *) ÂòªÂòª‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ÔºâÔºåÊâÄ‰ª• Shaun ÂèÇËÄÉÂÖ∂ÂÆòÊñπÊñáÊ°£ÂèäÂÖ∂ÂÆòÊñπÁ§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂÜô‰∏ãÊ≠§Êñá„ÄÇËØ¥ÊòéÁØá ËØ•ÁÆóÊ≥ïÊòØÈÄâÂèñ region proposalÔºà‰∏ÄËà¨ÁøªËØëÊàêÂÄôÈÄâÂå∫Âüü / Âå∫ÂüüÂª∫ËÆÆÔºâÈ¢ÜÂüü‰∏≠ÂΩìÊó∂ÁöÑ state-of-the-art„ÄÇÂÖ∂ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊÄùÊÉ≥Âá∫Ëá™ Jasper RR Uijlings, Koen EA van de Sande, Theo Gevers, and Arnold WM Smeulders. Selective search for object recognition. International journal of computer vision, 104(2):154‚Äì171, 2013.ÔºåËã•Ëã±ÊñáÊ∞¥Âπ≥‰∏çÂ§üÔºåËøòÊÉ≥‰∫ÜËß£ÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÊñáÊÄùÊÉ≥ËØ∑ÂèÇËÄÉÊñáÊú´ÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô„ÄÇ OpenCV‰∏≠ÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑÁõ∏Â∫îÂáΩÊï∞Ôºövoid cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentation::addGraphSegmentation(Ptr<GraphSegmentation> g);ÔºöÊ∑ªÂä†Áõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÂõæÂâ≤ÁÆóÊ≥ïÔºõvoid cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentation::addImage(InputArray img) ; ÔºöÊ∑ªÂä†ÂæÖÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÂõæÁâáÔºõvoid cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentation::addStrategy(Ptr<SelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategy> s); ÔºöÊ∑ªÂä†Áõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÁ≠ñÁï•ÔºàÈ¢úËâ≤Áõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶„ÄÅÁ∫πÁêÜÁõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶„ÄÅÂ∞∫ÂØ∏Áõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶ÂíåÂ°´ÂÖÖÁõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶ÔºâÔºõvoid cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentation::process(std::vector<Rect> &rects);ÔºöÁªìÂêàÂõæÂâ≤ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂíåÁõ∏Â∫îÁ≠ñÁï•ËøõË°åÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåËøîÂõûÂÄôÈÄâÊ°Ü„ÄÇÂÆû‰æãÁØá ‰ΩøÁî® Selective Search ÁÆóÊ≥ïÈúÄÂåÖÂê´#include <opencv2/ximgproc.hpp>ÔºåÂÆåÊï¥Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108#include <opencv2/opencv.hpp>#include <opencv2/ximgproc.hpp>void SSTest(){ // [Image segmentation](http://docs.opencv.org/3.2.0/d5/df0/group__ximgproc__segmentation.html#ga5e3e721c5f16e34d3ad52b9eeb6d2860) cv::Mat src_img = cv::imread("../data/true.png", CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYDEPTH | CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYCOLOR); // ËΩΩÂÖ•ÂéüÂßãÂõæÂÉè cv::namedWindow("src_img", CV_WINDOW_KEEPRATIO); cv::imshow("src_img", src_img); //// ËΩ¨Êç¢‰∏∫ÁÅ∞Â∫¶Âõæ //cv::Mat gray_img; //cvtColor(src_img, gray_img, cv::COLOR_BGR2GRAY); // ÂõæÂâ≤ÁÆóÊ≥ï cv::Ptr<cv::ximgproc::segmentation::GraphSegmentation> gs = cv::ximgproc::segmentation::createGraphSegmentation(); cv::Mat graph_segmented; gs->processImage(src_img, graph_segmented); normalize(graph_segmented, graph_segmented, 0, 255, CV_MINMAX); // ÂΩí‰∏ÄÂåñÂà∞[0,255]‰æõÊòæÁ§∫ graph_segmented.convertTo(graph_segmented, CV_8U); // Êï∞ÊçÆÁ±ªÂûãËΩ¨ÂåñÊàêCV_8UÂûã // cvtColor(graph_segmented, graph_segmented, CV_GRAY2BGR); cv::namedWindow("graph_segmented", CV_WINDOW_KEEPRATIO); imshow("graph_segmented", graph_segmented); // ‰∏∫selective searchÁÆóÊ≥ïÊ∑ªÂä†ÂõæÂâ≤ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂ§ÑÁêÜÁªìÊûú cv::Ptr<cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentation> ss = cv::ximgproc::segmentation::createSelectiveSearchSegmentation(); ss->addGraphSegmentation(gs); ss->addImage(src_img); // Ê∑ªÂä†ÂæÖÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÂõæÁâá // Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁ≠ñÁï• cv::Ptr<cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategy> sss_color = cv::ximgproc::segmentation::createSelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategyColor(); // È¢úËâ≤Áõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶Á≠ñÁï• cv::Ptr<cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategy> sss_texture = cv::ximgproc::segmentation::createSelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategyTexture(); // Á∫πÁêÜÁõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶Á≠ñÁï• cv::Ptr<cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategy> sss_size = cv::ximgproc::segmentation::createSelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategySize(); // Â∞∫ÂØ∏Áõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶Á≠ñÁï• cv::Ptr<cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategy> sss_fill = cv::ximgproc::segmentation::createSelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategyFill(); // Â°´ÂÖÖÁõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶Á≠ñÁï• // Ê∑ªÂä†Á≠ñÁï• cv::Ptr<cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategy> sss = cv::ximgproc::segmentation::createSelectiveSearchSegmentationStrategyMultiple(sss_color, sss_texture, sss_size, sss_fill); // ÂêàÂπ∂‰ª•‰∏ä4ÁßçÁ≠ñÁï• ss->addStrategy(sss); std::vector<cv::Rect> regions; ss->process(regions); // Â§ÑÁêÜÁªìÊûú // ÊòæÁ§∫ÁªìÊûú cv::Mat show_img = src_img.clone(); for (std::vector<cv::Rect>::iterator it_r = regions.begin(); it_r != regions.end(); ++it_r) { cv::rectangle(show_img, *it_r, cv::Scalar(0, 0, 255), 3); } cv::namedWindow("show_img", CV_WINDOW_KEEPRATIO); imshow("show_img", show_img); // -------ÂøΩÁï•‰∏äËø∞Ê≠•È™§ÔºåÁõ¥Êé•ÈááÁî®Êñπ‰æøÁÆóÊ≥ïÊèêÂèñÂÄôÈÄâÂå∫Âüü------------------------ /*************************************************************************** cv::Ptr<cv::ximgproc::segmentation::SelectiveSearchSegmentation> ss = cv::ximgproc::segmentation::createSelectiveSearchSegmentation(); ss->setBaseImage(src_img); // ÈááÁî®switch* functionsÊèêÂèñÂÄôÈÄâÂå∫Âüü ss->switchToSelectiveSearchFast(); // Âø´ÈÄüÊèêÂèñÂå∫Âüü std::vector<cv::Rect> rects; ss->process(rects); int nb_rects = 10; char c = (char)cv::waitKey(); while (c != 'q') { cv::Mat wimg = src_img.clone(); int i = 0; for (std::vector<cv::Rect>::iterator it = rects.begin(); it != rects.end(); ++it) { if (i++ < nb_rects) { cv::rectangle(wimg, *it, cv::Scalar(0, 0, 255), 3); } } cv::namedWindow("Output", CV_WINDOW_KEEPRATIO); imshow("Output", wimg); c = (char)cv::waitKey(); if (c == 'd') { nb_rects += 10; } if (c == 'a' && nb_rects > 10) { nb_rects -= 10; } } ********************************************************/}int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ SSTest(); while (cv::waitKey(0) != 27) {} return 0;}‰ª•‰∏ä‰ª£Á†ÅÂú® Win10 VS2013 ‰∏≠ÁºñËØëËøêË°åÊàêÂäü„ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ ‰ΩøÁî®ËØ•ÁÆóÊ≥ïÔºåË¶ÅÊÉ≥ËææÂà∞ÁêÜÊÉ≥ÊïàÊûúÔºå‰∏ÄËà¨ÈúÄË¶ÅË∞ÉÊï¥ÂõæÂâ≤ÁÆóÊ≥ïÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞ÊàñÊ≥®Èáä‰∏≠ÊñπÊ≥ï switchToSelectiveSearchFast() ÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞„ÄÇShaun ÁöÑËøôÊ¨°ÂÆûÈ™å‰∏∫‰∫ÜËææÂà∞ÁêÜÊÉ≥ÁöÑÈÄâÂèñÁöÑÊïàÊûúÔºåÂÖ∂Ë∞ÉÊï¥ÂèÇÊï∞Ëä±‰∫Ü‰∏çÂ∞ëÊó∂Èó¥ÔºåËÄå‰∏îËØ•ÁÆóÊ≥ïËøêË°åÊó∂Èó¥Âú® Shaun ÁîµËÑë‰∏äÁï•ÊòæÈïø„ÄÇGitHub ‰∏ä‰πüÊúâÂ§ßÁ•ûËá™Â∑±Áî® opencv ÂÆûÁé∞‰∫ÜËØ•ÁÆóÊ≥ïÔºåÂèÇËÄÉ watanika/selective-search-cppÔºåËØ•ÁÆóÊ≥ïÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞ÊÑüËßâÊØî OpenCV Ëá™Â∏¶ÁöÑ Selective Search ÁÆóÊ≥ïË¶ÅÂ•ΩË∞É‰∏Ä‰∫õÔºå‰ΩÜ‰ºòÂåñÊïàÊûúÊ≤°Êúâ opencv Â•ΩÔºåÂÖ∂ËøêË°åÊó∂Èó¥Âú® Shaun ÁîµËÑë‰∏äÊõ¥ÈïøÔºåÊØïÁ´ü OpenCV ÊòØ Intel ÁöÑ‰∫≤ÂÑøÂ≠êÔºåIntel ËÇØÂÆöÈíàÂØπÂ§ÑÁêÜÂô®ÂØπ OpenCV Â∫ïÂ±ÇÂÅö‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÂÆöÁöÑ‰ºòÂåñ„ÄÇÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô[1] ËÆ∫ÊñáÁ¨îËÆ∞ÔºöSelective Search for Object RecognitionÔºàhttp://jermmy.xyz/categories/%E8%AE%A1%E7%AE%97%E6%9C%BA%E8%A7%86%E8%A7%89/Ôºâ[2] Selective Search for Object Recognition(ÈòÖËØª)Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/langb2014/article/category/5772811Ôºâ[3] ËÆ∫ÊñáÁ¨îËÆ∞ „ÄäSelective Search for Object Recognition„ÄãÔºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/csyhhb/article/category/6048588Ôºâ

entry.title: Âà´‰∫ÜÔºåÊºÜÈªëÁöÑË±°ÁâôÂ°î
entry.content: ÂâçË®Ä ËøôÊòØ Shaun ‰ªéÊúãÂèãÈÇ£ÈáåÂê¨Êù•ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊïÖ‰∫ã„ÄÇÊ≠§ÁúüÂÆû‰∫ã‰ª∂Ê†πÊçÆÊïÖ‰∫ãÊîπÁºñÔºåÂ¶ÇÊúâÈõ∑ÂêåÔºåÂÆûÂ±ûÊ≠£Â∏∏„ÄÇÂ∫èÁØá ÊïÖ‰∫ãËøòÂæó‰ªéÊúãÂèãÂ§ßÂõõ‰∏äÂ≠¶ÊúüËØ¥Ëµ∑„ÄÇÂ§ßÂõõ‰∏äÂ≠¶ÊúüÂú®Á°ÆÂÆöËÉΩ‰øùÁ†î‰πãÂêéÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Ëøô‰∏™Êó∂‰ª£Âè™Ë¶ÅÊúâ‰øùÁ†îËµÑÊ†ºÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•Èöè‰æøÂéªÂì™ÊâÄÂ≠¶Ê†°ÔºåÊú¨Ê†°Âπ∂‰∏ç‰ºöÂπ≤Ê∂âÔºåÁî±‰∫éÊúãÂèãÊú¨ÁßëÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÈô¢Ê†°Âπ∂‰∏çÊòØÈùûÂ∏∏Â•ΩÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÊúãÂèãÂ∞±Êü•ÈòÖ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∫õÊõ¥Â•ΩÁöÑÂ≠¶Ê†°ÔºàÊØïÁ´ü‰∫∫ÂæÄÈ´òÂ§ÑËµ∞ÔºåÊ∞¥ÂæÄ‰ΩéÂ§ÑÊµÅÔºåËøôÂèØ‰ª•ÁêÜËß£ÔºâÔºåÂèØÊÉúÂõΩÂÜÖÈ°∂Â∞ñÁöÑÂ≠¶Ê†°ÈÉΩË¶ÅÊ±ÇËã±ËØ≠ÂæàÂ•ΩÔºåËÄåÊúãÂèãÁöÑËã±ËØ≠ÊàêÁª©‰∏ÄÁõ¥‰∏çÂ•ΩÔºåÁîöËá≥ÂèØ‰ª•ËØ¥ÊòØÊúÄÂ∑ÆÁöÑÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÊúãÂèãÂ∞±Áõ¥Êé•ÊîæÂºÉ‰∫ÜÈÇ£‰∫õÈ°∂Â∞ñÈô¢Ê†°Ôºà‰∏çËøá‰πüÊòØÊúãÂèãÂΩìÂπ¥ËßÅËØÜÂ§™Áü≠ÊµÖÔºåÂÖ∂ÂÆûÈô§ÂºÄÈÇ£‰∫õÁúüÊ≠£ÁöÑÈ°∂Â∞ñÈô¢Ê†°ÔºåËøòÊòØÊúâ‰∫õÊõ¥Â•ΩÁöÑÊú∫‰ºöÁöÑÔºâÔºåÊó¢ÁÑ∂È°∂Â∞ñÁöÑÂ≠¶Ê†°Ëøõ‰∏çÂéªÔºåÈÇ£Â∞±ÂéªÁúãÁúã‰∏ÄÊµÅÁöÑÈô¢Ê†°ÂêßÔºåÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÂèëÁé∞‰∏ÄÊâÄÂ≠¶Ê†°ÁöÑË¶ÅÊ±ÇÂæàÁÆÄÂçïÔºåÂü∫Êú¨‰∏çË¶ÅÊ±Ç‰ªÄ‰πàËã±ËØ≠ËÉΩÂäõÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÊúãÂèãÂ∞±ËÄÉËôë‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºåÊâæ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏ãËá™Â∑±ÁúüÊ≠£ÊÑüÂÖ¥Ë∂£ÁöÑ‰∏úË•øÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂ∞±ÂéªÂèëÈÇÆ‰ª∂ËÅîÁ≥ª‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏ãÈÇ£ÊâÄÈô¢Ê†°Á†îÁ©∂ÈÇ£‰∏™ÊñπÈù¢ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ËÄÅÂ∏àÔºåÂΩìÊó∂ÂÜôÈÇÆ‰ª∂Á≠âÊ∂àÊÅØÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊúãÂèãÁöÑÂøÉÊÉÖËøòÊòØÂæàÂøêÂøëÁöÑÔºåÁªà‰∫éÔºåÈÇ£ËæπÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÂõû‰∫ÜÊ∂àÊÅØÔºöÊ¨¢ËøéÊä•ËÄÉ„ÄÇ ÂêéÈù¢Âú®Êé®ÂÖçÁ≥ªÁªü‰∏≠Â°´ÂøóÊÑøÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊúãÂèãÂ∞±Áõ¥Êé•Â°´‰∫ÜÈÇ£ÊâÄÈô¢Ê†°ÔºåËøôÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÂèëÁîü‰∫Ü‰∫õÂ∞èÊèíÊõ≤ÔºåÂ∞±ÊòØÊúãÂèãÂΩìÊó∂ÂæàÂπ¥ËΩªÔºåÊÉ≥ÁùÄËØª‰∏™Â≠¶Á°ïËØïËØïÔºåÁªìÊûúÁ≠â‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÂ§©ÔºåÊ≤°ÊúâÊ∂àÊÅØÔºåÊúãÂèãÁöÑË∫´ËæπÊúâ‰∏™ÂêåÂ≠¶Â∑≤ÁªèÊãøÂà∞‰∫ÜÂ≠¶Á°ïÂΩïÂèñÈÄöÁü•ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Á¨¨‰∫åÂ§©‰∏ÄÂ§ßÊó©ÊúãÂèãÂ∞±Áõ¥Êé•ÁªôÈÇ£ËæπÊãõÁîüÁöÑÂú∞ÊñπÊâì‰∫Ü‰∏™ÁîµËØùÔºåÈóÆÈÇ£ËæπÊòØÂê¶Â≠¶Á°ïÂêçÈ¢ùÊòØÂê¶ÊãõÊª°‰∫ÜÔºå‰∏ìÁ°ïËøòÊúâÊ≤°ÊúâÊãõÊª°ÔºåÂΩìÂê¨Âà∞Â≠¶Á°ïÂ∑≤ÁªèÊãõÊª°Ôºå‰ΩÜ‰∏ìÁ°ïËøòÊ≤°ÊãõÊª°Êó∂ÔºåÊúãÂèãÂøÉÈáåÂΩìÊó∂ËøòÊòØÊúâÁÇπÂ§±ËêΩÁöÑÔºå‰ΩÜÊ≤°ÂäûÊ≥ïÔºåÂè™ËÉΩÂ∞ÜÂ≠¶Á°ïÁöÑÂøóÊÑøÊîπÊàê‰∏ìÁ°ï‰∫ÜÔºåËøòÂ•ΩÊúÄÂêéÈ°∫Âà©ÁöÑËøõÂÖ•‰∫ÜÈÇ£ÊâÄÂ≠¶Ê†°„ÄÇÊãøÂà∞ÂΩïÂèñÈÄöÁü•ÂêéÔºåÊúãÂèãËØïÁùÄÂíåÈÇ£‰ΩçËÄÅÂ∏àÊé•Ëß¶‰∫ÜÂá†Ê¨°ÔºåÂú®Êé•Ëß¶ÁöÑËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÂèëÁé∞ÔºåËøô‰ΩçËÄÅÂ∏àÂ∫îËØ•‰∏çÊòØÊúãÂèãÁêÜÊÉ≥‰∏≠ÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÔºåÁîöËá≥ÂèØ‰ª•ËØ¥ÊúâÁÇπÂ∑ÆÂä≤‰∫ÜÔºå‰ΩÜÊúãÂèãÂΩìÊó∂ËøòÊòØÂ§™Âπ¥ËΩªÔºåËÑ∏ÁöÆËñÑÔºå‰∏çÂ•ΩÊÑèÊÄùÂÜçÂéªÊâæÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Ëøô‰∏™Êó∂ÂÄôËÄÅÂ∏àËøòÊ≤°ÊúâÂÆåÂÖ®Á°ÆÂÆöÔºåÂÖ∂ÂÆûËøòÊòØÂèØ‰ª•Êç¢ËÄÅÂ∏àÁöÑ„ÄÇËØ¥Âà∞ËøôÈáåÔºåÊúãÂèãÊÄªÁªì‰∫ÜÂá†ÁÇπÊïôËÆ≠ÔºåÁÆóÊòØÁªôÂêéÊù•ËÄÖÁöÑÂèÇËÄÉÂêßÔºåÁî±‰∫éÊúãÂèãÊ≤°ËÄÉËøáÁ†îÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•‰∏çÁü•ÈÅìËÄÉÁ†îÊòØÊÄé‰πàÂõû‰∫ãÔºå‰ª•‰∏ãÂá†ÁÇπ‰∏ªË¶ÅÈíàÂØπÂèØËÉΩ‰øùÁ†îÁöÑÁ´•Èù¥Ôºö‰∏ÄËà¨ÁöÑÂ≠¶Ê†°ÂèØËÉΩË¶ÅÂà∞Â§ßÂõõ‰∏äÊâçËÉΩÂÆåÂÖ®Á°ÆÂÆö‰øùÁ†îËµÑÊ†ºÔºàÊúâÁöÑÂ≠¶Ê†°Â§ß‰∏â‰∏ãÂ∞±ÂÆåÂÖ®Á°ÆÂÆö‰∫ÜÔºâÔºåËÄåÊúâ‰∫õÁ†îÁ©∂ÁîüÊú∫ÊûÑÂú®Â§ß‰∏âÊöëÂÅáÊúüÈó¥ÂèØËÉΩÂ∞±ÊääÂΩïÂèñÂêçÈ¢ùÂü∫Êú¨Á°ÆÂÆö‰∫ÜÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Â¶ÇÊûúÂú®Â§ß‰∏â‰∏ãËßâÂæóËá™Â∑±ËÉΩ‰øùÁ†îÂπ∂‰∏îÊúâ‰øùÁ†îÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ïÔºåÂà§Êñ≠Ëá™Â∑±ËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩ‰øùÁ†îÂæàÁÆÄÂçïÔºåÊãøÁùÄ‰∏ä‰∏ÄÂ±ä‰øùÁ†îÁöÑ‰∫∫Êï∞ÁôæÂàÜÊØîÔºåÂú®ËÆ°ÁÆó‰∏Ä‰∏ãËá™Â∑±Âú®‰∏ì‰∏öÊéíÂêçÂâçÁôæÂàÜ‰πãÂ§öÂ∞ëÔºåÂÜçËÄÉËôë‰∏Ä‰∏ãÊéíÂêçÂêéÈù¢ÁöÑ‰øùÁ†îÂä†ÂàÜÊÉÖÂÜµÔºåÂ∞±ËÉΩÂà§Êñ≠Ëá™Â∑±ËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩ‰øùÁ†îÔºåÊØïÁ´ü‰∏çÂá∫ÊÑèÂ§ñÁöÑËØùÔºåÂêå‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏ì‰∏öÁöÑ‰øùÁ†îÊØîÁéáÊòØÂü∫Êú¨ÂèòÂåñ‰∏çÂ§ßÁöÑÔºåÊúãÂèãÂΩìÂπ¥ÂØπËá™Â∑±ÂæàÊ≤°Ëá™‰ø°ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Â∞±‰∏ßÂ§±‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∫õÊú∫‰ºöÔºå‰∏çËøáÊúãÂèãÂú®Êú¨ÁßëÊúüÈó¥‰πüÁ°ÆÂÆûÊ≤°Êúâ‰ªÄ‰πàËÉΩÊãøÁöÑÂá∫ÊâãÁöÑÊàêÁª©ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Â∞±ÁÆóÊúâËøô‰∫õÊú∫‰ºö‰πüÊ≤°Áî®„ÄÇÂú®Âà§Êñ≠Ëá™Â∑±ËÉΩ‰øùÁ†î‰πãÂêéÔºåÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÂéªÁΩë‰∏äÊü•ÈòÖËµÑÊñôÔºåÁúãÂì™‰∫õÈô¢Ê†°Êú∫ÊûÑÊòØÂú®ÊöëÂÅáÊàñ9Êúà‰ªΩÂ∞±Á°ÆÂÆöÂΩïÂèñÂêçÈ¢ùÁöÑÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄâÊã©Êä•ÂêçÂèÇÂä†ÂØπÊñπÁöÑÂ§è‰ª§Ëê•ÊàñÁ±ª‰ººÊ¥ªÂä®‰∫ÜÔºåËøôÈáåÈúÄË¶ÅÊ≥®ÊÑèÔºåÊúâ‰∫õÈô¢Ê†°Êú∫ÊûÑ‰øùÁ†îÂΩïÂèñÂØπÂ§è‰ª§Ëê•ÂæàÁúãÈáçÔºåËÄåÊúâ‰∫õÂ§è‰ª§Ëê•Ê¥ªÂä®ÂàôÂü∫Êú¨Ê≤°Áî®ÔºåÊä•Âêç‰πãÂâçÂ§öÊü•Êü•ÈóÆÈóÆÂêß„ÄÇÂú®ÈÄâËÄÅÂ∏àÊó∂ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊ≤°ÊúâÊâæÂ•ΩÁ°ÆÂàáÁöÑÁõÆÊ†áÔºåÂ∞±‰∏çË¶ÅÂéªÈöèÊÑèÁöÑËÅîÁ≥ª‰∏Ä‰∏™ËÄÅÂ∏àÔºåÊúÄÂ•ΩÂÅöÂ•ΩË∞ÉÊü•ÂÜçÂéªÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Ê≤°‰∫∫‰ºöÊÉ≥ÊääËá™Â∑±Êú™Êù•Âá†Âπ¥ÁöÑÁîüÊ¥ªËµåÂú®ËôöÊó†Áº•ÁºàÁöÑÂëΩËøê‰∏äÂêßÔºåÊØïÁ´üÁ†îÁ©∂ÁîüÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÁõ¥Êé•ÂÜ≥ÂÆöÁ†îÁ©∂ÁîüÁîüÊ∂ØËøáÁöÑÂíãÊ†∑ÔºåËÄÅÂ∏àÂæàÂ∑ÆÂä≤ÔºåÂèØËÉΩ‰∏ÄËæàÂ≠êÈÉΩÊØÅ‰∫ÜÔºåËá≥‰∫éÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÊâæ‰∏Ä‰∏™Áõ∏ÂØπÁêÜÊÉ≥ÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÔºå‰ª•‰∏ã‰∏§Á±ªËÄÅÂ∏à‰∏çË¶Å‰ºòÂÖàËÄÉËôëÔºö1„ÄÅ50Â≤Å‰ª•‰∏ä‰∏çÂú®ÁßëÁ†î‰∏ÄÁ∫øÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Âπ¥Á∫™Â§ßËÄåÂèà‰∏çÂú®ÁßëÁ†î‰∏ÄÁ∫øÂü∫Êú¨Â∞±ÂíåÁßëÁ†îÂÆåÂÖ®ËÑ±Á¶ª‰∫ÜÔºåËÄåËøô‰∏™Â≤ÅÊï∞ÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÊó¢Ë¶Å‰∏∫Áà∂ÊØçÂ≠©Â≠êËÄÉËôëËøòË¶Å‰∏∫Ëá™Â∑±ÈÄÄ‰ºëËÄÉËôëÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Âü∫Êú¨‰∏ä‰ºöÂ∞ΩÈáèÂéªÊçûÈí±ÔºåËÄå‰∏îÁî±‰∫é‰ªñ‰ª¨Âú®Ë±°ÁâôÂ°îÈáåÂëÜ‰∫Ü‰∏ÄËæàÂ≠êÔºåÂü∫Êú¨‰πüÂíåÂ§ñÈù¢ÁöÑÁ§æ‰ºöËÑ±ËäÇ‰∫ÜÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Âà´ÊÉ≥ÁùÄ‰ªñ‰ª¨‰ºöÂØπÂ≠¶ÁîüÊúâ‰ªª‰ΩïÂ∏ÆÂä©Ôºå‰∏çÈòªÁ¢çÂ≠¶ÁîüÁöÑÂèëÂ±ïÂ∞±ÊòØÁßØÈò¥Âæ∑‰∫ÜÔºåËÄå‰∏îËøô‰∏™Âπ¥Á∫™ÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÊúâ‰∏ÄÈÉ®ÂàÜÊÄùÊÉ≥ËøòÂÅúÁïôÂú®ÊóßÁ§æ‰ºöÔºåËÆ§‰∏∫Â≠¶ÁîüÂç≥Â≠¶ÂæíÔºåÊòØÂ∏àÂÇÖÁöÑÂ•¥Èö∂ÔºåÊûÅÂÖ∂‰∏çÂ∞äÈáçÂ≠¶ÁîüÔºõ2„ÄÅÂ•≥ËÄÅÂ∏àÔºåËøô‰∏çÊòØÊúãÂèãÊÄßÂà´Ê≠ßËßÜÔºåËÄåÊòØ‰ª•ÊúãÂèãËøô‰∫õÂπ¥ÁöÑËßÅËØÜÊù•ÁúãÔºåÂ•≥ËÄÅÂ∏àÁöÑ‰∏ÄÂ†ÜÂ±Å‰∫ãÁ°ÆÂÆûÊØîÁî∑ËÄÅÂ∏àË¶ÅÂ§ö‰∏ÄÁÇπÔºåË¶ÅÂ≠¶ÁîüÂπ≤ÁùÄÂπ≤ÈÇ£ÁöÑÔºåÂÜôÊñáÊ°£ÂÜôÊä•ÂëäÊãøÂø´ÈÄíÔºåÁîöËá≥ËøòÊúâÂ§áËØæÁ≠âÁ≠âÔºåÂΩìÁÑ∂Âπ∂‰∏çÊòØÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÂ•≥ËÄÅÂ∏àÈÉΩÊòØËøôÊ†∑ÔºåÁîöËá≥Êúâ‰∫õÂ•≥ËÄÅÂ∏àÊØîÁî∑ËÄÅÂ∏àËøòË¶ÅÂ•ΩÂæàÂ§öÔºåËøô‰∏™‰∏çËÉΩ‰∏ÄÊ¶ÇËÄåËÆ∫ÔºåÂè™ÊòØ‰ªéÊúãÂèãÊúâÈôêÁöÑËßÅËØÜÊù•ÁúãÔºåÁ¢∞Âà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Â•ΩÂ•≥ËÄÅÂ∏àÁöÑÂèØËÉΩÊÄßÊúâÁÇπ‰ΩéÔºå‰∏çËøáÂ¶ÇÊûúËÉΩÁôæÂàÜÁôæÁ°Æ‰ø°ËØ•ËÄÅÂ∏àÊòØ‰∏™ÁúüÊ≠£ÁöÑÂ•ΩËÄÅÂ∏àÔºåÂ∞±ÊîæÂøÉÂ§ßËÉÜÁöÑÊä•Âêß„ÄÇÂõ†‰∏∫Ëøô‰∏§Á±ªËÄÅÂ∏àËÉΩÂ§üÈùûÂ∏∏Áõ¥ËßÇÁöÑÁü•ÈÅìÔºåÂΩìÁÑ∂ËøòÊúâ‰∏ÄÁ±ªÁõ∏ÂØπÊù•ËØ¥‰πüÊØîËæÉÂÆπÊòìÁü•ÈÅìÔºåÈÇ£Â∞±ÊòØÂ§™Èó≤ÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏àÔºå‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂæàÂ•ΩÁöÑÂà§ÂÆöÊ†áÂáÜÂ∞±ÊòØÔºöÁªèÂ∏∏ÂëÜÂú®ÂäûÂÖ¨ÂÆ§ÁöÑËÄÅÂ∏à‰∏ÄËà¨ÂæàÈó≤„ÄÇÂ§™Èó≤ÁöÑËÄ getSearchFile = function(){ // Ë∞ÉÁî®ÊêúÁ¥¢ÂáΩÊï∞ var search_path = "<%- config.search.path %>"; if (search_path.length == 0) { search_path = "search.xml"; } var path = "<%- config.root %>" + search_path; searchFunc(path, 'local-search-input', 'local-search-result'); } inputArea.onfocus = function(){ getSearchFile() } // ÊêúÁ¥¢ÈáçÁΩÆ var $resetButton = $("#search-form .fa-times"); var $resultArea = $("#local-search-result"); inputArea.oninput = function(){ $resetButton.show(); } resetSearch = function(){ $resultArea.html(""); document.querySelector("#search-form").reset(); $resetButton.hide(); $(".no-result").hide(); } // Â±èËîΩÂõûËΩ¶ inputArea.onkeydown = function(){ if(event.keyCode==13) return false} // Êó†ÊêúÁ¥¢ÁªìÊûú $resultArea.bind("DOMNodeRemoved DOMNodeInserted", function(e) { if (!$(e.target).text()) { $(".no-result").show(200); } else { $(".no-result").hide(); } }) // ÊêúÁ¥¢ÂáΩÊï∞ var searchFunc = function(path, search_id, content_id) { 'use strict'; $.ajax({ url: path, dataType: "xml", success: function( xmlResponse ) { // get the contents from search data var datas = $( "entry", xmlResponse ).map(function() { return { title: $( "title", this ).text(), content: $("content",this).text(), url: $( "url" , this).text() }; }).get(); var $input = document.getElementById(search_id); var $resultContent = document.getElementById(content_id); $input.addEventListener('input', function(){ var str='<ul class=\"search-result-list\">'; var keywords = this.value.trim().toLowerCase().split(/[\s\-]+/); $resultContent.innerHTML = ""; if (this.value.trim().length <= 0) { return; } // perform local searching datas.forEach(function(data) { var isMatch = true; var content_index = []; var data_title = data.title.trim().toLowerCase(); var data_content = data.content.trim().replace(/<[^>]+>/g,"").toLowerCase(); var data_url = data.url; var index_title = -1; var index_content = -1; var first_occur = -1; // only match artiles with not empty titles and contents if(data_title != '' && data_content != '') { keywords.forEach(function(keyword, i) { index_title = data_title.indexOf(keyword); index_content = data_content.indexOf(keyword); if( index_title < 0 && index_content < 0 ){ isMatch = false; } else { if (index_content < 0) { index_content = 0; } if (i == 0) { first_occur = index_content; } } }); } // show search results if (isMatch) { str += "<li><a href='/"+ data_url +"' class='search-result-title' target='_blank'>"+ "> " + data_title +"</a>"; var content = data.content.trim().replace(/<[^>]+>/g,""); if (first_occur >= 0) { // cut out characters var start = first_occur - 6; var end = first_occur + 6; if(start < 0){ start = 0; } if(start == 0){ end = 10; } if(end > content.length){ end = content.length; } var match_content = content.substr(start, end); // highlight all keywords keywords.forEach(function(keyword){ var regS = new RegExp(keyword, "gi"); match_content = match_content.replace(regS, "<em class=\"search-keyword\">"+keyword+"</em>"); }) str += "<p class=\"search-result\">" + match_content +"...</p>" } } }) $resultContent.innerHTML = str; }) } }) } </script><%}%>ÊúÄÂêéÊâæÂà∞ spfk ‰∏ªÈ¢ò‰∏ãÁöÑ main.styl 1em;}/*Êó†ÂåπÈÖçÊêúÁ¥¢ÁªìÊûúÊó∂ÊòæÁ§∫*/p.no-result { display: none; margin: 2em 0 2em 6%; padding-bottom: 0.5em; text-align: left; color: #808080; font-family: font-serif serif; border-bottom: 2px solid #d3d3d3;} ËøôÈáåËØ∑Ê≥®ÊÑèÔºåÂΩìÂØπ main.styl Êñá‰ª∂ÂÅö‰ª•‰∏ä‰øÆÊîπÊó∂ÔºåÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÂèëÁé∞Êúâ‰∏§‰∏™ .search Ê†∑ÂºèÔºåËÄå‰∏îÁõ∏Â∑Æ‰∏çÂ§ßÔºåËøôÊó∂Ôºå‰∏çË¶ÅÂØπÂÖ∂ÂéüÊúâÁöÑ .search Âíå JavaScript encodeURIComponent() ÂáΩÊï∞ „ÄÇ=====================================================2„ÄÅÊêúÁ¥¢ÁªìÊûúÂå∫Â∏ÉÂ±ÄÊúâÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ ÈóÆÈ¢òÊèèËø∞ÔºöÂΩìÊòæÁ§∫ÊêúÁ¥¢ÁªìÊûúÊó∂ÔºåÊêúÁ¥¢ÁªìÊûúÂå∫‰ºö‰∏ä‰∏ãÊâ©Âº†Ôºå‰ªéËÄåÂ∞ÜÂÖ∂‰∏ä‰∏ãÊú¨Êù•Â≠òÂú®ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∫õÂ∏ÉÂ±ÄÊå§ÂºÄÔºåÈÄ†ÊàêÂ∏ÉÂ±ÄÊ∑∑‰π±„ÄÇËøôÂÖ∂ÂÆû‰∏çÁÆóÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ spfk ‰∏ªÈ¢òÊàñËÄÖÊñ∞Ê∑ªÂä†ÁöÑÊêúÁ¥¢ÂäüËÉΩÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåËÄåÊòØÊñ∞Ê∑ªÂä†ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏úË•øÂèàÊ≤°ÊúâÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÂíåÂéüÊú¨Â∏ÉÂ±ÄÁªìÂêàÁöÑÂ∏ÉÂ±ÄÊñá‰ª∂ÔºåÈÇ£Â∞±ÊûÅÂ§ßÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÊúâÂ∏ÉÂ±ÄÊ∑∑‰π±ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåËá≥‰∫éËøô‰∏™Ë¶ÅÂíåÂéüÊú¨Â∏ÉÂ±ÄÂ•ëÂêàÁöÑÊêúÁ¥¢ÁªìÊûúÂå∫Â∏ÉÂ±ÄÊñá‰ª∂Â∞±Âè™ÊúâÁ≠â Shaun ‰ª•ÂêéÊúâÊú∫‰ºöÊúâÊó∂Èó¥ÂÜçÂÆåÂñÑÂéªÂñΩ ‚ïÆ(‚ïØ‚ñΩ‚ï∞)‚ï≠„ÄÇ3„ÄÅÊêúÁ¥¢Ê°ÜÊøÄÊ¥ªÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ ÈóÆÈ¢òÊèèËø∞ÔºöÊêúÁ¥¢Ê°ÜÊøÄÊ¥ªÂª∂ËøüÂæàÂ§ßÔºåÊúâÊó∂ËøáÂæà‰πÖÊàñËÄÖÈúÄË¶ÅÂàáÊç¢Á´ôÂÜÖÈ°µÈù¢ÂÆÉÊâçËÉΩÊøÄÊ¥ªÔºåÁªô‰∫∫ÁöÑÊÑüËßâÂ∞±ÊòØÂ•ΩÂÉèÊ≤°ÊúâÊêúÁ¥¢ÂäüËÉΩ‰ººÁöÑ„ÄÇÊ∑ªÂä†ÊêúÁ¥¢Ê°ÜÊøÄÊ¥ªÂäüËÉΩÊçÆ‰ΩúËÄÖ MOxFIVE ÊâÄËØ¥ÊòØ‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰∏çËÆ©Á¥¢ÂºïÊñá‰ª∂ÂΩ±ÂìçÈ°µÈù¢Âä†ËΩΩÈÄüÂ∫¶ÔºåMOxFIVE ÂêåÊó∂‰πüÂú®ÊñáÊú´ÊåáÂá∫‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∫õ‰∏çË∂≥‰πãÂ§ÑÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÁ¥¢ÂºïÊñá‰ª∂Â§™Â§ßÔºåÂèØËÉΩËøòÊòØ‰ºöÈÄ†Êàê‰∏Ä‰∫õÈóÆÈ¢òÔºå‰ΩÜ Shaun ÁöÑÂçöÂÆ¢Êï∞ÈáèÂèà‰∏çÂ§öÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•‰º∞ËÆ°ËøòÊòØ Shaun ÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÊ∑∑ÂêàÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåËÄå‰∏î MOxFIVE ÁöÑÂçöÂÆ¢ÊêúÁ¥¢ÂäüËÉΩÂ•ΩÂÉèÊ≤°Ëøô‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºàËá≥Â∞ë Shaun ÁõÆÂâçÊ≤°ÂèëÁé∞Ôºâ„ÄÇËøô‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÂêåÊ†∑Âè™ÊúâÁ≠â‰ª•ÂêéÂÜçËØ¥‰∫Ü (*^__^*) ÂòªÂòª‚Ä¶‚Ä¶„ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ Êú¨ÊñáÊ∑ªÂä†ÁöÑÊú¨Âú∞ÊêúÁ¥¢ËøòÂæàÁ≤óÁ≥ôÔºåËøòÊúâÂæàÂ§öÂú∞ÊñπÈúÄË¶Å‰ª•ÂêéÂéªÂÆåÂñÑ„ÄÇ‰ΩÜËøôÂ•ΩÊ≠πÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â•ΩÁöÑÂºÄÂßãÔºåÊêúÁ¥¢ÂäüËÉΩËá≥Â∞ëÂãâÂº∫ËÉΩÂ§üÊ≠£Â∏∏‰ΩøÁî®ÔºåÊÄªÊØî‰ª•ÂâçÊòØ‰∏™Á©∫Â£≥Ë¶ÅÂ•ΩÔºå‰ª•ÂêéÊúâÊú∫‰ºöÂÜçÊÖ¢ÊÖ¢ÂéªÂéªÂÆåÂñÑÂêß ‚Üñ(^œâ^)‚Üó„ÄÇÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô[1] jQuery-based Local Search Engine for HexoÔºàhttp://www.hahack.com/categories/codes/Ôºâ[2] ËÆ© Hexo ÂçöÂÆ¢ÊîØÊåÅÊú¨Âú∞Á´ôÂÜÖÊêúÁ¥¢Ôºàhttp://moxfive.xyz/tags/Hexo/Ôºâ[3] HexoÂçöÂÆ¢Ê∑ªÂä†Á´ôÂÜÖÊêúÁ¥¢Ôºàhttps://www.ezlippi.com/categories/hexo/Ôºâ[4] HexoÊú¨Âú∞ÊêúÁ¥¢ÂèäÈÉ®ÂàÜSEO‰ºòÂåñ Ôºàhttps://www.oyohyee.com/categories/Note/Ôºâ

entry.title: Áî®OpenCVÊòæÁ§∫OpenGLÂõæÂΩ¢
entry.content: ÂâçË®Ä Êú¨ÊñáÂ∞±ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∞èÂÆûÈ™åÔºåËØïÈ™å OpenCV Âà∞Â∫ïËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩÊîØÊåÅ OpenGL ÂõæÂΩ¢ÊòæÁ§∫„ÄÇÊ≠£Êñá Â¶ÇÊûúÂú® OpenCV Áî® CMake ÁºñËØëÊó∂ÂãæÈÄâ WITH_OPENGL ‰∏îÁºñËØë‰∏ÄÂàáÈ°∫Âà©ÁöÑËØùÔºåÁºñËØëÂíåÈÖçÁΩÆÁöÑÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊ≠•È™§ÂíåÊÉÖÂÜµÂèØ‰ª•Áúã Shaun ÂÜôÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁØáÊñáÊ°£ÔºöWin10ÔºãVS2013ÔºãCMake-guiÁºñËØëÂíåÈÖçÁΩÆOpenCV-3.2.0 ÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•Áî® OpenCV Á™óÂè£ÊòæÁ§∫ OpenGL ÂõæÂΩ¢„ÄÇ Âú® VS ‰∏ã‰ΩøÁî® Windows ÂéüÊúâÁöÑ OpenGL ÂáΩÊï∞ÈúÄË¶ÅÂåÖÂê´‰ª•‰∏ãÂ§¥Êñá‰ª∂ÂíåÂ∫ìÊñá‰ª∂Ôºö123456#include <Windows.h>#include <GL/gl.h>#include <GL/glu.h>#pragma comment(lib, "OpenGL32.lib")#pragma comment(lib, "glu32.lib") Âú® OpenCV ‰∏≠ÊòæÁ§∫ OpenGL ÂõæÂΩ¢ÈúÄË¶Å cv::namedWindow(openGLWindowName, cv::WINDOW_OPENGL)ÔºåÂú® namedWindow ÂáΩÊï∞‰∏≠Ê∑ªÂä† cv::WINDOW_OPENGL ÂèÇÊï∞ËØ¥ÊòéËØ•Á™óÂè£ÊîØÊåÅ OpenGL ÂõæÂΩ¢„ÄÇÈôÑÁ§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºö#include <opencv.hpp>#include <Windows.h>#include <GL/gl.h>#include <GL/glu.h>#pragma comment(lib, "OpenGL32.lib")#pragma comment(lib, "glu32.lib")static const float vertex_list[][3] ={ -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f,};// Â∞ÜË¶Å‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÈ°∂ÁÇπÁöÑÂ∫èÂè∑‰øùÂ≠òÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Êï∞ÁªÑÈáåÈù¢ static const GLint index_list[][2] ={ { 0, 1 }, { 2, 3 }, { 4, 5 }, { 6, 7 }, { 0, 2 }, { 1, 3 }, { 4, 6 }, { 5, 7 }, { 0, 4 }, { 1, 5 }, { 7, 3 }, { 2, 6 }};static float rotate = 0;static int times = 0;GLint windowWidth = 800;GLint windowHeight = 800;GLfloat xRotAngle = -75.0f;GLfloat yRotAngle = 0.0f;GLfloat zRotAngle = -135.0f;float MIN_X = -200;float MAX_X = 200;float MIN_Y = -200;float MAX_Y = 200;float MIN_Z = -200;float MAX_Z = 200;GLfloat coordinatesize = 200.0f;GLfloat ratio = 1;void drawLine(float x1, float y1, float z1, float x2, float y2, float z2){ glBegin(GL_LINES); glVertex3f(x1, y1, z1); glVertex3f(x2, y2, z2); glEnd(); glFlush();}// ÁªòÂà∂Á´ãÊñπ‰Ωìvoid DrawCube(void){ int i, j; glBegin(GL_LINES); for (i = 0; i < 12; ++i) // 12 Êù°Á∫øÊÆµ { for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) // ÊØèÊù°Á∫øÊÆµ 2‰∏™È°∂ÁÇπ { glVertex3fv(vertex_list[index_list[i][j]]); } } glEnd(); glFlush();}void reshapeOperate(){ glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION); glLoadIdentity(); if (ratio < 1) glOrtho(-coordinatesize, coordinatesize, -coordinatesize / ratio, coordinatesize / ratio, -coordinatesize, coordinatesize); else glOrtho(-coordinatesize*ratio, coordinatesize*ratio, -coordinatesize, coordinatesize, -coordinatesize, coordinatesize); glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW); glLoadIdentity();}void reshape(int w, int h) { if ((w == 0) || (h == 0)) return; glViewport(0, 0, w, h); ratio = (GLfloat)w / (GLfloat)h; reshapeOperate();}GLfloat AngleX = 45.0f;GLfloat AngleY = 315.0f;void reshape1(int w, int h){ GLfloat aspect = (GLfloat)w / (GLfloat)h; GLfloat nRange = 100.0f; glViewport(0, 0, w, h); glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION); //Â∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁü©ÈòµÊåáÂÆö‰∏∫ÊäïÂΩ±Ê®°Âºè glLoadIdentity(); //ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏âÁª¥ÊäïÂΩ±Âå∫ if (w <= h) { glOrtho(-nRange, nRange, -nRange * aspect, nRange * aspect, -nRange, nRange); } else { glOrtho(-nRange, nRange, -nRange / aspect, nRange / aspect, -nRange, nRange); }}void onDraw(void*){ // Draw something using OpenGL here //glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT); //Ê∏ÖÈô§ÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÂÉèÁ¥† //glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW); //glLoadIdentity(); //glPushMatrix(); ////glTranslatef(-0.2, 0, 0); // Âπ≥Áßª ////glScalef(2, 1, 1); // Áº©Êîæ //glRotatef(xRotAngle, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f); //glRotatef(yRotAngle, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f); //glRotatef(zRotAngle, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f); //glColor3f(1, 0, 0); //drawLine(0, 0, 0, MAX_X, 0, 0); //xËΩ¥ //glColor3f(0, 1, 0); //drawLine(0, 0, 0, 0, MAX_Y, 0); //yËΩ¥ //glColor3f(0, 0, 1); //drawLine(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, MAX_Z); //zËΩ¥ //times++; //if (times > 1) //{ // times = 0; //} //if (times % 1 == 0) //{ // rotate += 0.3; //} //glRotatef(rotate, 0, 1, 0); //glRotatef(rotate, 1, 0, 0); //glColor3f(0, 1, 1); //DrawCube(); //glPopMatrix(); reshape1(windowWidth, windowHeight); glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT); glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW); glLoadIdentity(); AngleX++; AngleY++; glPushMatrix(); { glRotatef(AngleX, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f); glRotatef(AngleY, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f); glBegin(GL_POLYGON); //ÂâçË°®Èù¢ glColor3ub((GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)255);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÁôΩËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, 50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3ub((GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)0);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈªÑËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, -50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3ub((GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)0, (GLubyte)0);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫Á∫¢Ëâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, -50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3ub((GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)0, (GLubyte)255);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÁôΩËâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, 50.0f, 50.0f); glEnd(); glBegin(GL_POLYGON); //ÂêéË°®Èù¢ glColor3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈùíËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, 50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÁªøËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, -50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈªëËâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, -50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ËìùËâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, 50.0f, -50.0f); glEnd(); glBegin(GL_POLYGON); //‰∏äË°®Èù¢ glColor3d(0.0, 1.0, 1.0);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈùíËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, 50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3d(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÁôΩËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, 50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3d(1.0, 0.0, 1.0);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÂìÅÁ∫¢Ëâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, 50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3d(0.0, 0.0, 1.0);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ËìùËâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, 50.0f, -50.0f); glEnd(); glBegin(GL_POLYGON); //‰∏ãË°®Èù¢ glColor3ub(0u, 255u, 0u);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÁªøËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, -50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3ub(255u, 255u, 0u);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈªÑËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, -50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3ub(255u, 0u, 0u);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫Á∫¢Ëâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, -50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3ub(0u, 0u, 0u);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈªëËâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, -50.0f, -50.0f); glEnd(); glBegin(GL_POLYGON); //Â∑¶Ë°®Èù¢ glColor3ub((GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)255);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÁôΩËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, 50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3ub((GLubyte)0, (GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)255);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈùíËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, 50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3ub((GLubyte)0, (GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)0);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÁªøËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, -50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3ub((GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)255, (GLubyte)0);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈªÑËâ≤ glVertex3f(50.0f, -50.0f, 50.0f); glEnd(); glBegin(GL_POLYGON); //Âè≥Ë°®Èù¢ glColor3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÂìÅÁ∫¢Ëâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, 50.0f, 50.0f); glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ËìùËâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, 50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÈªëËâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, -50.0f, -50.0f); glColor3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);//È¢úËâ≤ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫Á∫¢Ëâ≤ glVertex3f(-50.0f, -50.0f, 50.0f); glEnd(); } glPopMatrix();}void opencvWithOpenGLTest(){ std::string openGLWindowName = "OpenGL Test"; cv::namedWindow(openGLWindowName, cv::WINDOW_OPENGL); cv::resizeWindow(openGLWindowName, windowWidth, windowHeight); cv::setOpenGlContext(openGLWindowName); cv::setOpenGlDrawCallback(openGLWindowName, onDraw, NULL); while (cv::waitKey(30) != 27) { cv::updateWindow(openGLWindowName); // when needed }}int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ opencvWithOpenGLTest(); return 0;}ËøêË°åÊàêÂäüÂêéÂèØÁúãÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊóãËΩ¨ÁöÑÂΩ©Ëâ≤Á´ãÊñπ‰Ωì„ÄÇÁªìËÆ∫ ‰ªéÂÆûÈ™åÁªìÊûúÊù•ÁúãÔºåOpenCV Á°ÆÂÆûËÉΩÊîØÊåÅ OpenGL ÂõæÂΩ¢ÁöÑÊòæÁ§∫Ôºå‰ΩÜÂÖ∂‰∏çË∂≥‰πãÂ§Ñ‰πüÂæàÊòéÊòæÔºöÊ≤°ÊúâÊèê‰æõÈº†Ê†áÂíåÈîÆÁõòÁöÑ‰∫§‰∫íÊìç‰ΩúÔºàÂèØËÉΩÊòØ Shaun ËøòÊ≤°ÂèëÁé∞ÔºåÊØïÁ´üÂè™ÊòØÂ∞ùËØï‰∏Ä‰∏ãÁúãÂÆÉËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩÊòæÁ§∫ÔºâÔºå‰ªÖ‰ªÖÂè™ÊòØÊèê‰æõ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊòæÁ§∫Á™óÂè£„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúÁúüÊÉ≥Áî® OpenGL ÂÅö‰∏Ä‰∫õÂ•ΩÁé©ÁöÑ‰∏úË•øÔºåËøòÊòØÁî® glut Âíå glew ÂêßÔºå‰∏çËøá glut Â∑≤ÁªèÂÅúÊ≠¢Êõ¥Êñ∞ËÆ∏‰πÖÔºåglew Âú®Ë∞ÉËØïÊó∂ÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞‰∏Ä‰∫õËé´ÂêçÂÖ∂Â¶ôÁöÑÈîôËØØÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÁΩë‰∏äÊúâ‰∫∫Áî® freeglut ‰ª£Êõø glutÔºåglee ‰ª£Êõø glewÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìÁöÑ‰∏úË•ø Shaun ‰πüÊ≤°ËØïËøáÔºåShaun ÁõÆÂâçËøòÊ≤°ÂÅöËøá OpenGL Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑ‰∫ãÔºåËøôÊ¨°Áî® OpenCV ÊòæÁ§∫ OpenGL ÂõæÂΩ¢Á∫ØÁ≤πÊòØ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÂ•ΩÁé© (*^__^ *) ÂòªÂòª‚Ä¶‚Ä¶„ÄÇÂêéËÆ∞ Êú¨ÁØáÊñáÊ°£‰πüÊòØ‰∏äÊ¨°ÁºñËØëÈÖçÁΩÆÂÆå OpenCV-3.2 ÂêéÂÅöÁöÑ‰∏ÄÊ¨°Â∞èÂÆûÈ™åÔºå‰ΩÜÂΩìÊó∂Âπ∂Ê≤°ÊúâËÆ∞ÂΩïÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ËøòÊúâ‰∏Ä‰∫õÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô‰πüÂ∑≤Áªè‰∏çÁü•ÈÅì‰∫Ü :-(„ÄÇÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô[1] OpenCVÂ≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºàÂÖ≠ÂçÅ‰∏ÄÔºâ‚Äî‚ÄîÂª∫Á´ãÊîØÊåÅOpenGLÁöÑOpenCVÂ∑•Á®ã‚ÄúMaster OpenCV‚Äùchp.3Ôºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/yang_xian521/article/category/910716Ôºâ[2] Âá†‰∏™openglÁ´ãÊñπ‰ΩìÁªòÂà∂Ê°à‰æãÔºàhttp://blog.csdn.net/bcbobo21cn/article/category/3104565Ôºâ

ÊØè‰∏™‰∫∫ÁöÑÊ≥®ÈáçÁÇπ‰∏ç‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÔºåÂ∏¶Âá∫Êù•ÁöÑ‰∫∫‰πü‰∏ç‰∏ÄÊ†∑„ÄÇ2014-09-20How did we escape from the prison? It was the work of generations of searchers who took five simple rules to heart . Question authority. No idea is true just because someone says so. Think for yourself . Question yourself. Don‚Äôt believe anything just because you want to. Believing something doesn‚Äôt make it so. Test ideas by the evidence gained from observation and experiment. If a favorite idea fails a well-desidned test, it‚Äôs wrong! Get over it. Follow the evidence, wherever it leads. If you have no evidence , reserve judgment. And perhaps the most important rule of all‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ Rember, you could be wrong. Even the best scientists have been wrong about somethings. Newton, Einstein, and every other great scientist in history, they all made mistakes. of course they did ‚Äì they were human, Science is a way to keep from fooling ourselves and each other. Have scientists known sin? of course. We have misused science, just as we have every other tool at our disposal, and that‚Äôs why we can‚Äôt afford to leave it in the hands of a powerful few. The more science belongs to all of us, the less likely it is to be misused. These values undermine the appeals of fanaticism and ignorance. ‚Äî‚Äî„ÄäCosmos: A Spacetime Êñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏≠ÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ _config.ymlÔºö12# theme: landscapetheme: black-blue black-blue ‰∏∫ÊâìÂåÖ‰∏ªÈ¢òÊñá‰ª∂Âπ∂ÊîæÂÖ• \blog\themes Êñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏≠ÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂Â§πÂêçÔºåÂπ∂‰∏çÊòØÂéü‰∏ªÈ¢òÂêçÔºåÂè™ÊòØ entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"More info: WritingRun server1$ hexo serverMore info: ServerGenerate static files1$ hexo generateMore info: GeneratingDeploy to remote sites1$ hexo deployMore info: Deployment
